María is 40 years old. She lives happily in her humble home with her life partner and four children aged 3, 12, 20 and 23. María is a hardworking mother who seeks to give the best to her children. Every day, María provides domestic services near her community in order to meet the basic needs of her children. Her partner works as a builder in an institution. This is how he contributes to the household finances.

Maria requests a loan through FUSAI to install electricity and balcony doors for added security. She will invest in the electricity installation permit payment and to buy balcony doors to provide security for her family.

loans.use: to make electricity installation permit payment and to buy balcony doors to provide security for her home.

loans.name: Maria Rosenda

texts.es:
María, de 60 años de edad, nunca fue a la escuela, porque eran 10 hermanos y sus padres no tenían los recursos para que todos fueran a la escuela, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 10 hijos, 8 de ellos tienen su propio hogar, 2 viven con ellos y están estudiando.

María, desde que tenía 20 años de edad se dedica a vender tamales, refrescos, tostadas y enchiladas, todo eso lo aprendió gracias a su mamá, pero desde hace 20 años vende especias, esto lo aprendió con una amiga, porque ella la incluyo en ese negocio.- María, comprar las especies por libras en el mercado de la ciudad más cercana, pero tiene que tomar un bus que recorre 15 kilómetros, después lo embolsa y sale a vender en las tiendas de sus cantones y pueblos vecinos, su horario es de 6:00 a.m. y regresa a las 3:00 p.m. 

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar, pimienta gorda, comino, canela, mostaza y mayonesa.

Sus sueño son ver a sus 2 ultimas hijas, graduarse de la universidad; además desea mejorar su negocio e incorporar otros productos, también sueña con terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 60 years old. She never went to school because she was one of 10 siblings an her parents didn't have the resources to send all of them to school. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. She has 10 children. Eight live in their own homes, while 2 live with them and are studying.

Since María was 20 years old, she has sold tamales, soft drinks, tostadas, and enchiladas. She learned to make these from her mother. For the past 20 years, she has sold spices, which she learned from a friend who included her in her business. María buys the spices by the pound at the market in the nearest city, but she has to take a bus for 15 kilometers. She then divides the spices into bags and sells them to stores in her canton and in nearby towns. Her schedule is from 6:00am to 3:00pm.

María needs the loan to buy all-spice, cumin, cinnamon, mustard, and mayonaise.

Her dream is to see her 2 youngest daughters graduate from university. She also wants to improve her business and incorporate other products. She also dreams of finishing building her house.

loans.use: to buy all-spice, cumin, cinnamon, mustard, and mayonaise.

loans.name: Amiya Ranjan

texts.en:
Amiya Ranjan, 29, is an honest and hardworking boy from Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. He is a bachelor student majoring in a Banking Diploma (PGDBM) from Times Pro. Amiya Ranjan chose this major because it is easier to find jobs in this field at this time.

He has been facing some financial problems that prevent him from paying his university fees and completing his studies. Thus, he has applied for an education loan of 72,000 INR to help him pay for his course fees.

Amiya Ranjan always has felt supported with the help of his mother, who is a single mother. His mother is doing tailoring and overnight work so as to make her son's studies possible and cover his household expenses.

As the years go on, he feels more excited about his studies, for which he wants to have all of the necessary tools to continue being an excellent student. For this reason, he is asking for a loan to pay for his banking course fees. In his plans is to study for a technical career upon finishing his undergraduate degree and provide all luxuries to his mother.

loans.use: to pay for his course fees.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos de 37 años vive con su madre su vivienda es propia es un hombre honrado y trabajador, por lo que se caracteriza entre quienes lo conocen, se esfuerza por llevar el alimento diario a su madre de avanzada edad. Él se dedica a prestar sus servicios de albañilería dentro y fuera de su comunidad por la calidad de su trabajo sus clientes lo prefieren. El está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera, clavos, para el cambio de techo de la galera de su vivienda, ya que este ya se encuentra muy deteriorado y se filtra el agua y el piso de esta es de tierra y se hace lodo y el teme por algún accidente que su madre pueda sufrir a causa de esto, es por eso que el espera la aprobación de su crédito para realizar la mejora cuanto antes.
texts.en: Carlos, who is 37 years old, lives with his mother. His has his own home, he is an honest and hard-working man, which characterizes him among those who know him. He makes an effort to bring daily nourishment to his mother, who is of advanced age. He works doing construction inside and out of his community. His clients prefer him because of the quality of his work. He is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of laminate, wood, and nails, to change the roof of the chicken pen of his house, as this is very deteriorated. It has water leaks, and the floor is made of dirt, and therefore mud forms. He is afraid that his mother could have an accident because of this. This is why she hopes for the approval of a loan to make the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of laminate, wood, and nails, to change the roof of the chicken pen in his house.

loans.name: Fanuel

texts.pt:
O senhor Fanuel vive maritalmente, tem 31 anos de idade, estudou ate 10ª classe, vive pai de  4 filhos, 2 com idade  escolar e os outros ainda menores, vive na casa própria a base de negocio e condução de carros de carga, esta a repetir o credito pela quinta vez, com os anteriores investiu sempre no negocio e na construção de sua casa, que já esta quase no fim e antes vivia numa de construção precária.
Pretende com o crédito comprar pintos, ração e vitaminas para ampliar a sua criação de frangos.
Seu maior sonho é abrir um negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade para a sua esposa, construir capoeiras condignas e terminar sua casa.
O capital que usa é que tem limitado os seus objectivos pelo facto de não ser suficiente.
texts.en:
Fanuel is 31 years old and studied through the 10th grade in school. He lives with his wife and four children, two of whom are in school and two of whom are not yet of school age. The family lives in their own home and Fanuel works as a supply truck driver.

This is Fanuel's 5th loan with Hluvuku [Kiva Field Partner], and he used previous loans to invest in his business and in the construction of his home. His home construction project is almost finished, and previously the family had lived in a very flimsily constructed home.

With this loan, Fanuel plans to buy chicks, feed and vitamins in order to expand his business raising chickens. In the future, he would like to open a store that his wife could run selling basic everyday products. He would also like to build better-constructed chicken coops and completely finish building of his home. His limited funds have made it hard to achieve all of his goals.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed and vitamins to expand his business raising chickens

loans.name: Maria Andrea

texts.es:
María, de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, debido a que sus padres no pudieron pagarle más los estudios; está soltera, pero tiene 5 hijos, todos tiene su propio hogar y con ella viven solamente dos sobrinas, las cuales dependen económicamente de ella.

María, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, y con la ayuda de un sobrino a podido seguir sembrado maíz; antes se dedicaba también a la venta de maíz  y otros granos básicos, el terreno donde trabaja está a 3 horas de viaje en bus y su sobrino es quien hace todo el trabajo.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar abono, pesticidas, semillas y otros productos agrícolas para la siembra de maíz, con este préstamo mejorará sus ingresos, porque podrá comprar todo lo que necesita para la siembra.

Sus sueños son, tener muchos cultivos y obtener una gran cosecha.
texts.en:
María, 54, has a third grade education due to the fact that her parents were unable to afford further education for her. She is single but has 5 children. All of them have their own homes, so only two nieces live with her and are financially dependent on her.

María has farmed for 10 years, and with a nephew's help has been able to continue growing corn. Previously she also sold corn and other staple grains. The parcel of land she farms is a 3-hour bus trip away, and her nephew is the one who does all the work.

She needs the loan to buy manure, pesticides, seeds, and other agricultural products for growing corn. With this loan she will improve her income, because she will be able to buy everything she needs for planting.

Her dream is to have a large area under cultivation and obtain a large harvest.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides, seeds and other agricultural products for growing corn.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, debido a la situación económica en que vivían sus padres no pudo seguir estudiando, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar, tiene tres hijos de 2, 4, 6 años de edad, ellos todavía no asisten a la escuela porque son muy pequeños.

Carlos, se dedica a la mecánica, enderezado y pintura de carros desde hace más de 15 años, él aprendió esta actividad desde muy pequeño, ahora tiene su propio taller en su casa. 

Carlos, necesita el crédito para comprar materiales y herramientas que necesita para enderezado y pintura de carros en su taller.

Carlos, siempre ha soñado con construir un muro perimetral en su casa para tener más privacidad.
texts.en:
Carlos is 50 years old. He studied through second grade; due to his parent's economic situation, he was unable to continue studying. He lives with his partner and she is a homemaker. They have three children that are 2, 4, and 6 years old. They don't go to school yet because they're too young.

Carlos works as a mechanic. He has been doing body work and paint on cars for more than 15 years. He learned this busines when he was very young and now he has his own shop in his home.

Carlos needs the loan to buy materials and tools that he needs to do the bodywork and paint the cars in his shop.

Carlos has always dreamed of building a wall around his house so they can have more privacy.

loans.use: to buy materials and tools that he needs to do bodywork and paint the cars in his shop.

loans.name: Donys Danilo

texts.es:
Donys, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, debido a la pobreza en la que vivían sus padres, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios de la casa y a cuidar aves de corral; tiene 4 hijos, 2 estudian y los otros todavía no asisten a la escuela. 

Donys, es vendedor de dulces y agua de coco desde hace 20 años, la necesidad de generar ingresos para el hogar, lo llevo a tomar la decisión de trabajar de esa manera, el lugar donde vende está a 2 kilómetros y hace el recorrido en bicicleta, su horario de trabajo es de 5:00 a.m. hasta las 9:00 a.m. vende dulces y de las 9:00 a.m. en adelante vente agua de coco.
 
El crédito lo necesita para comprar dulces para el negocio, porque quiere comprar al por mayor para que le hagan más descuentos por sus comprar y que el producto sea más barato. 

Los sueños de Donys, son que sus ventas crezcan y que sus hijos puedan estudiar para prepararse y ser personas de bien para la sociedad.
texts.en:
Donys, age 30, studied until second grade, owing to the poverty in which his parents were living. He is married, and his wife takes care of the household chores and the poultry. He has four children. Two are studying and the others are not yet attending school.

Donys has been a vendor of sweets and coconut water for twenty years. The need to generate income for his home led him to make the decision to work in this way. The area in which he sells is two kilometers away, and makes the trip on a bicycle. He works from 5:00 a.m. until 9:00 a.m. selling sweets, and from 9:00 a.m. onward he sells coconut water.

He needs the loan to purchase sweets for the business. He wants to purchase at wholesale, so that they will give him more discounts for his purchases, and the product will be cheaper.

The dreams of Donys are that his sales may grow, and that his children may study in order to prepare themselves and be people who are good for society.

loans.use: to purchase sweets for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in Duralite, screws, and poles to change her home's roof.

loans.name: Yesica Alejandra

texts.es:
La historia de Yesica se remonta hace 5 años cuando llego a Medellín desplazada de Florencia caldas, vino sola, tuvo que dejarlo todo atrás, su capacidad de adaptarse es grandiosa, inmediatamente busco empleo y empezó lavando platos en un restaurante, fue adquiriendo experiencia y ahora trabaja en otro restaurante con un mejor salario.

El difícil suceso que vivió Yesica quedó atrás, ahora solo tiene su mirada puesta en el futuro.
Yesica quiere solicitar un préstamo para pagar un curso de cocina avanzada, su propósito es capacitarse y ser una gran cocinera, terminar sus estudios de secundaria y estudiar una carrera de cocina para montar su restaurante.
texts.en:
Yesica's story starts 5 years ago when she arrived in Medellín, displaced from the town of Florencia Caldas. She came alone and had to leave everything behind. She has a great capacity for adapting, so she immediately began looking for work. She began washing plates in a restaurant. She gained experience and now works in another restaurant with better pay.

The difficult situation that Yesica lived in is in the past. She now looks only to the future.

Yesica is requesting the loan to pay for an advanced cooking course. Her goal is to train and be a great chef, finish her high school studies, and study for a career in cooking so she can open her own restaurant.

loans.use: to pay for an advanced cooking course. She wants to improve her knowledge so she can do better work.

loans.name: Teodoro Noel

texts.es:
Teodoro, de 25 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador y muy luchador, está casado y su esposa ha sido su ayuda y su apoyo en la venta y distribución de la carne que él destaza.

Teodoro, se dedica a destazar cerdos y ganado desde hace 3 años, junto con su compañera de vida están trabajando muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, de esta manera ellos generan los ingresos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar.

El dinero del préstamo lo necesita para comprar cerdos para el destazo y la comercialización de carne en la comunidad.

Teodoro, anteriormente se le otorgó un crédito para que comenzara con la crianza y comercialización de cerdos y le ha dado buenos resultados, es por eso que sueña con tener una carnicería bien establecida en el mercado del pueblo.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 25 years old, he is a very hardworking man and is very determined. He is married and his wife has been his help and support in the sale and distribution of the meat that he butchers. 

Teodoro has made a living butchering swine and cattle for the last 3 years. Along with his wife he works very hard to move forward for his children, and in this way they earn the necessary income to cover household expenses. 

He needs the loan money to buy pigs to butcher and sell in the community. 

Teodoro was previously given a loan so that he could begin raising and selling pigs and he has had good results. This is why he dreams of having a well established butcher's shop in the town market.

loans.use: to buy pigs to butcher and sell in the community.

loans.name: Genara

texts.en: Genara is 49 years old. She and her family live in Talibon, Bohol. Genara is engaged in buying and selling bananas. She also farms rice and raises hogs for additional income. She is requesting a loan from CEVI to buy feed for her hogs, fertilizer for her farm, and more bananas to sell. She realized that she could do better with her farming if she received financial assistance. She hopes to renovate her house once she saves enough from her business. Her income will also pay for schooling her children, who are ages 4, 13, and 14.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs, fertilizer for her farm, and more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, es una mujer muy trabajadora que esta luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, es artesana y esta luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida a través de su trabajo y esfuerzo, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder comprar sobrecamas, sabanas y hamacas.
Ella hoy pide nuevo préstamo para la compra de más sobrecamas, sabanas y hamacas, para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca is from the city of Carapeguá. She is a very hardworking woman who is striving to improve her quality of life. She is an artisan who is improving her condition through work and effort. She says that she used her previous loan to buy bedspreads, bedsheets, and hammocks.

Now she is requesting a loan to buy more bedspreads, bedsheets, and hammocks to continue with her business as she has been doing so far. This way she can continue striving to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bedspread, bedsheets, and hammocks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: sheet metal, beams, and screws to repair the roof of her home, which leaks due to the rain and dampens her household belongings.

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
Ella es Diana, una empresaria trabajadora, emprendedora, humilde, ella tiene 26 años de edad, contrajo matrimonio, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad.

Inicio un negocio de tienda de abarrotes a principios de abril del presente año, guiada por la necesidad de apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, vivir cómoda y dignamente y asegurar un futuro a sus niños.

Diana Trabaja 6 días a la semana, 12 horas diarias, su principal dificultad es mantener abastecida la tienda, ya que al llevar tna poco tiempo en el mercado no ha llegado a un equilibrio.

Buscándome sostenibilidad y perdurabilidad de su negocio, Diana quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido variado de; gaseosas, lácteo, granos, snacks y licores.
texts.en:
This is Diana. She is a hardworking businesswoman, entreprenurial, and of humble circumstances. She is 26 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and their two children, who are 7 and 3 years old.

She started a small grocery store this year at the beginning of April. She felt a need to help her husband with the household expenses so they could live comfortably, in a dignified manner, and also secure a future for their children.

Diana works 6 days per week, 12 hours each day. Her main difficulty is keeping her store stocked; since she has so little time with her business, she hasn't yet found a financial balance.

In order to make her business sustainable and durable, Diana is requesting a loan to buy a variety of inventory: soft drinks, dairy products, basic grains, snack items, and liquors.

loans.use: to buy a variety of inventory: soft drinks, dairy products, basic grains, snack items, and liquors.

loans.name: Mukta

texts.en:
Mukta is an energetic woman of 27 years living in a small village of Falakata, Alipurduar district in West Bengal. She lives with her husband and two sons. The elder son is a student of grade 5 and the younger one is a preschooler.

The main source of income of Mukta's family is cultivation. Her husband Satyen cultivates different types of vegetables and crops, and sells his harvests in the local village market. Mukta also assists her husband in this agribusiness; they earn an average income by which Mukta maintains her four-member family. This income is barely sufficient to manage all the expenses of her family, so she and her husband decided to cultivate “ber,” a soft and juicy fruit that is very popular to the regional people of West Bengal. In West Bengal it is called ‘kul.’ The beginning of monsoon is the best time for planting Bers. Mukta has chosen this because the climate and soil is suitable for ber cultivation. So Mukta seeks a loan from BJS (a Kiva partner) to purchase farm inputs for ber cultivation.

She hopes that this loan will help her to earn more profit and ensure financial stability in her family. In the future she dreams of constructing a concrete house for her family with the generated profit.

Mukta thanks her generous lenders.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for ber cultivation.

loans.name: Kelvi Joel

texts.es:
Kelvi tiene 22 años de edad, conviviente, tiene dos hijos, en el distrito de Cayalti que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Kelvi se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Kelvi espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Kelvi is twenty-two years old, he lives with his partner, and he has two children. He lives in the district of Cayaltí, which is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque Region of Peru's northern coast. Life in the community is tranquil. The residents work primarily in commerce and in raising small livestock.

Kelvi provides a passenger transport service in his vehicle. He has experience in the sector, and very good personal and work references in the zone.

The loan will be used for making repairs and for maintaining his vehicle, as currently, it is in bad condition. With this, Kelvi expects to offer his customers better service, which will generate greater earnings. Therefore, he will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Pratima

texts.en:
Pratima is a 41-year-old married woman of Falakata. A mother of three sons, Pratima is a homemaker. Her two older sons are engaged in some income generating jobs but her youngest son is a student. Her husband runs his own hotel to earn the livelihood for the family.

Pratima is a hardworking woman who wants to provide a good education to her sons. The insufficient income of her family is the main hindrance that makes the children unable to go ahead with their continuous education. But Pratima wants to educate their son at any cost. Her youngest son Apu, 19 years old, is a student of grade 11 in Parangerpar Sishu Kalyan High School. He is a boy with average merit but is attentive and studious. He wants to get involved in a good business after his graduation, but he cannot get the necessary educational supplies and private tuition for his present academic course because of his parents' poor financial resources.

Pratima has taken a loan from BJS (a Kiva partner) to purchase study materials and pay all educational fees for her son. She hopes it will help her son to get an uninterrupted education and reach his goal.

Pratima and Apu (in the picture) are thankful to BJS and Kiva for this loan.

loans.use: to cover the education costs of grade 11 for her youngest son.

loans.name: Carolyne

texts.en:
Carolyne is a married woman. She has five children. She describes herself as God fearing. Carolyne operates a restaurant and has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. 

Carolyne will use this 70,000 KES loan to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food. She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a married woman. She describes herself as determined. She operates a 'posho' mill where she grinds maize to produce maize flour for selling. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. 

Beatrice describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use this 50,000 KES loan to buy more maize. Her business goal is to buy another grinding machine within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy more maize.

loans.name: Renee Lyn

texts.en: Renee Lyn is a 43-year-old woman from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She is married with three children ages twelve, nine and six years old. Her husband works hard as an OFW (Overseas Filipino Worker). Renee Lyn runs a sari-sari store business. She hopes to increase her profitability so that in the future her husband might not need to go abroad for work. Thus, she is asking a loan to buy assorted grocery items such as chips, candies, biscuits, spices, noodles, cooking oil, sugar, soft drinks, drinking liquor, coffee, powdered milk and chocolate drink.  Aside from running a sari-sari store, Renee Lyn raises pigs.

loans.use: to buy chips, candies, biscuits, spices, noodles, cooking oil, sugar, soft drinks, drinking liquor, coffee, powdered milk, and chocolate drinks

loans.name: Linet

texts.en:
Linet is a single woman with three children. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a tailoring business where she makes clothes. She has been involved in this business for six years. 

Linet's business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. She will use this 30,000 KES loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. She hopes that in the future, she will have more sewing machines and employ more people. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tailoring materials.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Camino Al Sol Group

texts.es: Doña Xinia es una señora con 41 años de edad,casada y con tres hijos. Actualmente vive con su esposo y una hija menor de edad que le queda a cargo. La escogieron como tesorera del Banco Mujer Camino al Sol, porque tiene el conocimientos y experiencia necesaria para llevar éste cargo. Está mujer tan emprendedora siempre ha buscado la manera de ayudar a su familia y a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Su actividad principal es la agricultura de plátano. Es la única fuente de ingreso familiar, debido a que realiza su actividad junto con su esposo. Ella ya ha tenido varios préstamos anteriormente. Éste banco mujer se ha caracterizado por la excelente moral de pago y organización entre si. Los créditos pasados los invirtió en una tostadora de plátano pero ahora lo va a invertir en comprar semilla para sembrar una hectárea de plátano. Las socias que forman éste grupo viven en la reserva indígena Bratsi de Talamanca, carecen de fuentes de empleo y tienen muchas necesidades, es por éste motivo que las socias emprenden sus negocios de forma familiar. Doña Xinia tiene muchos planes a futuro y los quiere lograr obteniendo mayores ingresos y asi mejorar la calidad de vida de ellas y su familia. Junto con ella hay tres socias más que invertirán en el comercio tanto la reventa del plátano como en abarrotes para una pulpería. Todas las integrantes buscan fines en común debido a que los financiamiento les permiten invertir más en sus actividades productivas y con los ingresos pueden cubrir las necesidades básicas del hogar y hacer frente a la deuda adquirida, ya que ven una oportunidad de crecimiento y superación.
texts.en:
Xinia is a 41 year old woman who's married with three children. She was chosen as the treasurer for the women's bank Camino al Sol (Walk to the Sun) because she has the knowledge and experience to do this job.

This very hardworking woman has always looked for ways to help her family and her husband with household expenses. Her main activity is growing bananas. This is the only source of family income because she does the work together with her husband.

She has already had several loans previously. This women's bank is known for its excellent morale for payments and organization among members. She invested past loans in a banana roaster and now wants to invest in buying seeds to plant one hectare of banana.

The members of this group live in the Bratsi de Talamanca indigenous reserve and lack sources of employment. They have many necessities, which is why they do business in familiar ways.

Xinia has many planes for the future and wants to continue earning a better income to improve her and her family's quality of life. Together with her, there are three other members who invest in the buying and resale of bananas (for example, for a grocery store).

All the members look for sources in common because financing allows them to invest more in their productive activities. With the income, they can cover basic household necessities and deal with the debt acquired because they see an opportunity for growth and improvement.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for banana farming.

loans.name: Sabita

texts.en:
Sabita is a 30-year-old lady who lives in Falakata of West Bengal. She is a mother of one son. Sabita studied till grade 8. But she is willing to provide her son a good education and desires that her son does not face any obstacle in receiving an education.

Sabita’s husband has been associated with agricultural activities for many years. Sabita‘s husband's earnings are hardly enough to cover the educational expenses of their son after meeting the household costs for their family.

Sabita’s 13 year old son Ripan is now studying in Grade 8 in Khrierkote High School and very much serious about his studies. He aims to become a businessman in future. Now he needs some educational materials and help of private tuition to score good marks in his exams.

Sabita learned about BJS (a Kiva partner) and applied for a loan for her son’s uninterrupted education. With the loan amount she will pay the school fees and private tuition fees and to buy necessary articles, a bicycle for her son Ripan.

Sabita and her son Ripan are very much grateful to Kiva and BJS for this loan. They give hearty thanks to the lenders.

loans.use: to pay the tuition fees and buy necessary articles for her son’s educational purpose.

loans.name: Anjuma

texts.en:
43-year-old Anjuma lives in a small village named Uttar Alta Gram in Falakata. She has three children (one son and two daughters). Her husband is engaged with a livestock business. Anjuma’s children are all studying. Though the family income is scanty, Anjuma is striving hard to provide education to her children.

Anjuma’s elder daughter Aloktara is 21 years old and pursuing her Bachelor degree in Arts from Sukanta Mahavidyalaya. She cherished a dream from her childhood to become a teacher and teach the poor village children. To fulfill her dream she strives hard to complete her graduation securing good marks. Both Anjuma and her husband have great expectations for their elder daughter. They expect she will achieve high educational qualifications to compete with progressive people in social status. But they can't afford the huge educational expenses of their daughter.

Anjuma is requesting a loan from BJS (a Kiva partner) to bear the educational expenses of her daughter. She plans to pay college fees, buy study materials, and engage private tutors for her daughter. The loan will help this bright young girl continue her education without any obstacles.

Anjuma and Aloktara (in the photo) are grateful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's educational expenses.

loans.name: Nazaria

texts.en:
For the last 15 years, Nazaria has been engaged in buying and selling native mats. She is married with four grown children and is a resident of the town of Loon, Bohol. Nazaria needs additional capital to support her source of living. Her husband has an income that could help cater to the daily needs of his family.

She is asking for a loan to buy more stock of native mats. With these, she could purchase the order of her customers and deliver it on time. Thus, her earnings will improve and she will be able to pay her obligation. In this way, Nazaria could start to handle her finances and expand. She hopes that she will be able to handle her buy-and-sell business in preparation for old age.

loans.use: to buy more native mats for reselling.

loans.name: Pushpabala

texts.en:
Pushpabala is a young and enterprising woman of 35 years from a small village, Nandi Baneswar under Kandi, in the district of Murshidabad. She is married and a mother of three children (one son and two daughters). All of her children are students. She did not receive any formal education in her young age, and can only sign her name.

Her husband is engaged in an agribusiness, growing seasonable vegetables. His earnings are insufficient for a family of five members, so Pushpabala has decided to share her husband's financial burden by practicing cattle farming. She finds dairy farming enjoyable and profitable. She wants to purchase a dairy cow and forage for the cow. She will supply milk door-to-door to her neighbors. But the biggest challenge she faces is limited funds.

Pushpabala is seeking a loan to buy a dairy cow and cow feed. It will produce enough milk to enable her to cater to her clients and satisfy her customers, earning a substantial amount to help the family to alleviate their poverty. So, she has taken a loan from a Kiva partner, BJS.

She dreams to purchase more cows in the future to enlarge her business in order to provide higher education to her children. She has a long-cherished dream to construct a concrete house for them to live in.

She gives her heartiest thanks to her lenders, BJS, and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for starting a milk selling business.

loans.name: Moneymaker Group

texts.en:
Portia, a member of a group called Money Maker, travels to South Africa once a month to buy clothes for reselling at her flea market stall. She leaves her children and spends two days in South Africa buying a range of goods such as of cosmetics, jewellery, shoes, bags, and school wear. Since she started her business in 2008, she has been able to grow her business and employ one person to help run her two flea market stalls.

Portia is 27 years old; she works hard to put food on the table for her family. She also takes care of her extended family. In order to raise sufficient income for her family, she occasionally travels to neighbouring Zambia to buy African attire and plastic sandals for reselling. She intends to grow her business so that she gets more profits to build her own house. 

Portia needs a loan so that she can improve the stock levels at her two flea market stalls by travelling to South Africa and to Zambia. The Moneymaker group is looking forward to a 1,400 USD loan from Kiva to help them grow their businesses and build houses of their own.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics, jewellery, shoes, bags and other items for reselling.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia se desempeña en su propio proyecto de ganado para producción de leche. Solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (₡ 1 000 000), para la compra de animales que le permitirán aumentar su producción y de esta manera incrementar los ingresos provenientes de esta actividad.
texts.en: Sonia is working on her own dairy cattle project. She is requesting a loan for a million colones (₡ 1 000 000), for the purchase of animals that will allow her to increase her production, and in this way, increase her earnings from this activity.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Camino Al Sol Group

texts.es: Banco Mujer Camino al Sol es un grupo que se formó en el año 2010 en la comunidad de Suretka de Talamanca, la cual es reserva indígena. Son señoras de la misma comunidad que se organizaron para obtener financiamientos y poder asi reforzar sus actividades productivas, ya que la mayoría cuenta solo con los estudios de primaria e incompletos. Ellas realizan sus trabajos en familia, ya que en ese lugar se dan las actividades de subsistencia, pero sin embargo ellas logran unirse y salir adelante. Éste es el ingreso principal de sus hogares. Todas cuentan con hijos estudiando en primaria o secundaria. Siempre se han caracterizado por su buen comportamiento de pago en sus créditos anteriores. Éste es el cuarto crédito que solicitan para reforzar sus negocios. Rosibel es una joven con 31 años de edad, madre de tres hijos y jefa de hogar. Actualmente dos de sus hijos estudian y ella cursa la universidad, con la finalidad de superarse y darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Está cursando la carrera de Educación Preescolar. Cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres en el cuido de sus hijos, además con el de su padre para el cuido de su ganado, debido a que lo tiene en la finca de ÉL. Éste nuevo crédito lo va invertir en comprar novillas para engordar y luego salir a venderlas en la subasta, la cual es su comprador. Tiene experiencia en varias actividades las cuales le generan para poder estudiar y asi cumplir sus metas, debido a que es la única manera de superarse porque las fuentes de empleo en esa comunidad son escasas. Junto con Rosibel hay tres socias más que invertiran sus préstamos en compra de ganado, agricultura de plátano y abarrotes. Todas buscan financiamientos para reforzar sus negocios, asi superarse y crecer poco a poco.
texts.en:
The women's bank Camino al Sol (Walk Toward the Sun) was formed in 2010 in the Suretka de Talamanca community, which is an indigenous reserve. They are women from the same community who organized themselves to earn financing. This made them able to strengthen their productive activities, as the majority have a primary school or lower education.

They work in families because this is where subsistence activities occur, but the women are able to come together and move forward. This is the main income for their households. All have children studying in primary or secondary school. They have always been known for their good behavior with repayment in their earlier loans. This is the fourth loan they've taken out to strengthen their businesses.

Rosibel is a young woman who's 31. She's the mother of three children and the head of the house. Currently, two of her children are in school and she attends university, with the goal of improving herself and giving her family a better quality of live. She's studying for a career in preschool education. She relies on help from her parents to care for her children and her father's help to care for her livestock, due to the fact that they live on his farm.

She will invest this new loan in buying heifers to fatten and later sell at auction, which is her buyer. She has experience in various activities that earn money for her to be able to study and thus achieve her goals. This is the only way to get ahead because sources of work are scarce in this community.

Together with Rosibel are three other women who will invest their loans in buying livestock, banana farming and a groceries. All seek financing to strengthen their businesses, improving themselves and growing little by little.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: Doña Alejandra es una mujer de 39 años, es divorciada y jefa de hogar, vive con sus 2 hijas, ambas menores de edad y estudiantes, para ella su negocio es muy importante para su superación personal y para su familia. Su actividad es un centro de fotocopiado, ubicado dentro de un instituto de enseñanza, el cual brinda el servicio de fotocopias, impresiones, levantado de texto, encuadernado y otros, todos estos servicios están dirigidos a los alumnos de la institución. Inició este emprendimientos hace cinco años, con apoyo de un hermano quien le alquilaba la fotocopiadora, pero luego su hermano cerró la empresa y le entregó la fotocopiadora, fue así como se consolidó en el negocio. Gracias a esta actividad productiva, la clienta percibe ingresos que le permite cubrir sus gastos, familiares, personales y algunos gastos de estudio de sus niñas. El crédito será invertido en el mantenimiento y reparación de las máquinas fotocopiadoras, herramienta indispensable en su labor diaria, esto le permitirá mejorar la calidad de impresión y aumentar la producción. Doña Alejandra trabaja con mucho esmero para sacar adelante a sus hijas, labor que debe coordinar muy bien para atender sus labores de madre y empresaria. Requiere de apoyo económico, para continuar con su negocio y lograr el fortalecimiento de su actividad productiva.
texts.en:
Alejandra is a 39 year old woman who is divorced and the head of her household. She lives with her two daughters, both minors and students. Her business is very important to her, for her personal improvement and for her family.

Her work is a photocopy center located in a learning center, where she provides services like photocopying, printing, typesetting, binding and others. All these services are aimed at students of the institution.

She began this business five years ago with support from a brother who rented her the photocopier, but he later closed the business and gave it to her. This was how she took over the business. Thanks to this productive activity, she earns income that allows her to cover her family and personal expenses, and some of her daughters' educational expenses.

The loan will be invested in the maintenance and repair of copy machines, an indispensable tool in her daily work. This will allow her to improve the quality of printing and increase production. Alejandra works with a lot of care to move her children forward, work that should be coordinated very well work to meet her obligations as a mother and businesswoman. She requires financial support to continue her business and strengthen her productive activity.

loans.use: to maintain and repair photocopiers.

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en: Priscilla is 31 years old and a mother of two from Wedza District, Zimbabwe. She is currently operating a retail business at a local flea market. She sells cell phone minutes, wrist watches, flashlights, toothbrushes, shoes, and waist belts. She has been so successful that she has employed two people. When she is not at work, she volunteers at local schools offering counselling services to troubled students and cleaning classrooms. Priscilla dreams of being economically independent and opening her own store one day. Using her first loan she purchased cell phone minutes, wrist watches, flashlights, toothbrushes, shoes, and waist belts to increase her stock. This improved her business considerably by bringing her the stability needed to secure her children’s education as well as provide for her family’s basic needs. Priscilla‘s business has been doing well since she received the first Kiva loan. She purchased more stock for her business and added variety to her products. She has managed to expand her business and pay for her children’s school fees. She is very grateful for the loan and hopes to borrow another larger loan so she can further expand her clothing business.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of clothes for her store

loans.name: Las Victoriosa Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Las Victoriosas, están en su primer ciclo, son mujeres muy trabajadoras que se fijaron como meta poder mejorar sus vidas, todo a través del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Viviana quien vende remedios naturales, ella es una persona humilde que sabe que con sacrificio está logrando todo lo que tiene. Pese a lo humilde de su trabajo por medio de el lucha para el sustento de su familia, y para poder darles para el día a día.
Viviana pide este préstamo para poder comprar remedios naturales en cantidad para poder seguir con sus ventas, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
This group is called Las Victoriosas (The Victorious). They are in their first cycle and are very hardworking women who set a goal to improve their lives, all through the program for the elimination of poverty.

One of the members is Viviana, who sells natural remedies. She is a humble person who knows she is achieving everything she has with sacrifice. Despite her humble work, she's able to strive to support her family through it, and to provide for them day by day.

Viviana seeks this loan to be able to buy natural remedies in bulk and continue with her sales. In this way, she'll be able to continue striving to improve her life and the lives of her loves ones.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies to sell.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en: Cynthia is 38 years old and lives in Wedza District in eastern Zimbabwe. She has been actively volunteering in and out of schools for the past 15 years as an early childhood development teacher and community health officer. Cynthia strives to improve the well-being of her community. She has had a tobacco farm for the past three years. Her long-term commitment to her community led her to employ four people on her farm. The business has enabled her to survive financial hardships and is critical to her financial security. Cynthia’s business is doing considerably well. She used her first Kiva loan to purchase fertilizers and chemicals for her crops. With the profits she purchased tobacco seed and maize seed to increase production for the next season. She managed to start construction of her house with the profits. She is grateful for the loan and hopes to get a second larger loan to expand her farming business.

loans.use: To purchase more seedlings, fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María es de profesión docente, a la par se dedica a la venta de  joyas, sus padres se dedican a la agricultura.
Comenta que con mucho sacrificio pudo terminar sus estudios por  lo costoso que era  y  por lo alejado que quedaba la casa de estudios. Ahora ya es docente y también vende las joyas ya que tiene una hija pequeña a quien debe mantener debido a que ella es madre soltera. Es una mujer muy luchadora y sacrificada que quiere salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar joyas variadas para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Maria is a teacher by profession, but she also earns a living selling jewelry. Her parents work in agriculture. She says that with a lot of sacrifice she's been able to finish her studies, which were very costly and required her to remain in school for a long time.

Now she's a teacher and also sells jewelry because she has a young daughter she has to take care of and she's a single mother. She is a very tenacious and sacrificing woman who wants to move forward. She's asking for this loan to be able to buy various jewelry to continue her sales as she's been doing.

loans.use: to buy various jewelry for sale.

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.ru: Санавбар заботливая женщина. Ей 37 лет, замужем и живет со своей семьей на районе А.Джоми. Санавбар работает медсестрой в больнице и параллельно занимается шитьем национальной одежды. Она считает у каждой женщины должно быть ремесло. Сейчас Санавбар решила отремонтировать дом, но у неё нет достаточно денег, чтобы купить стройматериалы. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом, надеясь, что с вашей помощью она сможет купить стройматериалы и оплатить услуги рабочих - строителей. Спасибо!
texts.en: Sanavbar is a caring woman. She is 37 years old, married and lives with her family in the A. Jomi district. Sanavbar works as a nurse at a hospital and also earns a living by sewing national clothing. She thinks that every woman should have a trade. Now Sanavbar decided to repair her house, but does not have enough money to buy construction materials. This is why she requested this loan, hoping that with your help, she can buy construction materials and pay construction workers. Thank you!

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay for the repair of her house

loans.name: Sitoramo

texts.ru: Ситорамо 35 летняя жительница района Пяндж. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Муж занимается земледелием в родном районе. Ситорамо на районе занимается земледелием. Она выращивает кукурузу уже 5 лет. Ситорамо опытная и честная дехканка. Она сейчас закончила посев и ей необходимо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить богатый и здоровый урожай. Для купли достаточного количества минеральных удобрений у нее нет денежных средств, и по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Ситорамо заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Sitoramo is a 35-year-old resident of the Pyandj district. She is a married mother of three children. Her husband is involved in farming in his native district. Sitoramo is also involved in farming in her district. She has been growing corn for 5 years. Sitoramo is an experienced and honest dekhan farmer. She just finished sowing her crop and now needs to cultivate the land with mineral fertilizers in order to obtain a rich and healthy harvest. She does not have enough money to buy mineral fertilizers, and this is why she requested this loan. Sitoramo expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: New Africa Group

texts.en:
Frank, who is in his early 30s, is single with one child who is in school. Frank has been selling second-hand clothes for two years now. He works from 4 p.m. to 9 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Frank's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He will use this loan to buy first-class second-hand clothes to meet his customers' needs. He dreams of expanding his business.

Frank will share this loan with his loan group New Africa, which consists of six members, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. (Only half of Tatu's face can be seen).

loans.use: to buy first-class second-hand clothes to meet his customers' needs.

loans.name: Kimat

texts.ru: Кимат 50-летняя жительница района Джиликуль. Джиликуль находится на юго-западной части Таджикистана и имеет хорошие погодные условия для ведения сельского хозяйства. Кимат проживает здесь давно. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Сыновьям 23 и 21 лет, а дочери 18 лет. Ее муж вместе сыновьям находится на  заработках в Российской Федерации. Кимат сама занимается разведением крупного рогатого скота в течение 10 лет. Она покупает молодых телят, откармливают их несколько месяцев, и потом вывозит на продажу. Целью данного кредита является развитие животноводческой деятельности. Кимат планирует увеличить поголовье скота и тем самым улучшить условия жизни семьи. Она надеется на Вашу помощь. Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас.
texts.en: Kimat is a 50-year-old resident of the Jilikul district. Jilikul is situated in the south-western part of Tajikistan and has good weather conditions for running an agricultural business. Kimat has been living here for a long time. She is married and has three children. Her sons are 23 and 21, and daughter is 18 years old. Her husband and sons are in the Russian Federation for work. Kimat has been involved in fattening up cattle for 10 years. She buys young calves, fattens them up for several months and then takes them out for sale. The goal of this loan is to develop her animal husbandry business. Kimat plans to increase her livestock headcount and, thus, improve her family's life. She hopes for Your help. You can support her now.

loans.use: to develop her animal husbandry business

loans.name: Bargigul

texts.ru: Это женщина Баргигул. Ей 28 лет. Она жительница района Гиссар. Баргигул в районе проживает вместе детьми, а муж находится в Российской Федерации на заработках. Баргигул занимается шитьем национальной одежды. Этой деятельностью она занята около 5 лет. Баргигул хочет расширить деятельность и купить новые ткани, которые недавно привезли на рынок района. Она планирует сшить новые платья и этим привлечь больше клиентов. Для приобретения тканей Баргигул обратилась за кредитом. Подержите Баргигул:)
texts.en: The name of this woman is Bargigul. She is 28 years old. She is a resident of the Gissar district. Bargigul lives with her children in the district, and her husband is in the Russian Federation for work. Bargigul is involved in sewing national clothing. She has been in this business for about 5 years. Bargigul wants to expand her business and buy new fabrics that were recently delivered to the district market. She plans to sew new dresses and attract more customers. Bargigul requested this loan to buy fabrics. Please support Bargigul :)

loans.use: to buy fabrics and expand her business

loans.name: Akram

texts.ru: Акрам простой житель района Пяндж. Ему 41 лет. Он женат и отец двоих детей. Маленькому сыну 3 года. Дочке 9 лет. Дочка учится в средней школе.   Акрам в течение 2 года продвигает торговую деятельность. Он решил освоить деятельность брата, и вместе братом иметь собственный бизнес. Акрам помогает клиентам с выбором одежды. Он продает рубашки и брюки. Акрам только продает мужские одежды. Он хочет, привозит еще одежды для расширения бизнеса. Акрам надеется с расширением бизнеса увеличиться товарооборот и увеличиться доход. Он с такими планами обратился за кредитом. Акрам надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Akram is a simple resident of the Pyandj district. He is 41 years old. He is a married father of two children. His youngest son is 3 years old, and daughter is 9. The daughter attends a secondary school. Akram has been running a retail business for 2 years. He decided to learn his brother's business and have a business together with his brother. Akram helps customers choose clothing. He sells shirts and pants. Akram only sells men's clothing. He wants to bring in more clothing to expand his business. Akram hopes that the expansion of his business would lead to increased goods turnover and income. he requested this loan to fulfill these plans. Akram hopes for your Your support.

loans.use: to bring in more clothing and expand his business

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en:
Aziza, who is in her late 30s, is married with three kids who are still in school. She has been selling rice door to door for two years now. She works from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Aziza’s second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to establish her business and has paid back all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group. She used the profit to pay school fees, loan repayment and household expenses. She will use this loan to sell rice door to door in order to meet her customers' requirements. She dreams of being an international businesswoman.

Aziza will make sure she pays her loan within the loan schedule time.

loans.use: to sell rice door to door.

loans.name: Tohirjon

texts.ru: Тохирчон проживает в городке Турсунзаде. Город был назван в честь великого народного писателя и героя Таджикистана. Тохирчон годится тем, что живет в этом городе. Он живет вместе с семьей и детьми. Тохирчон занимается животноводством. Тохирчон работает много и усердно, чтобы прокормить свою семью. Смысл его жизни это семья его дети, ради них он живет и работает. Тохирчон решился обратиться за кредитом, потому что хочет расширить свою деятельность и покрывать семейные расходы. Растут дети, растут и их расходы. Тохирчон за счет заемных средств купит несколько голов крупнорогатых скотин и увеличит их поголовья. Он верит, что может стать хорошим предпринимателем в сфере животноводства благодаря Вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Tohirjon lives in the town of Tursun-zoda. The town was named after a great national writer and hero of Tajikistan. Tohirjon is proud that he lives in this town. He lives there with his family and children. Tohirjon is involved in animal husbandry. Tohirjon works a lot and very diligently to provide for his family. His family and children provide the meaning of his life, and he lives and works for their sake. Tohirjon decided to request this loan because he wants to expand his business and cover the family's expenses. The children are growing and so are the expenses. Tohirjon will use the loan to buy a few cows and increase his cattle headcount. He believes that he will become a good entrepreneur in the animal husbandry field thanks to Your support.

loans.use: to buys cows and expand his business

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a first-year student at Kepler. The first of her family to attend university, she was selected from over 6,000 applicants this year. Monica chose Kepler because of the entrepreneurship opportunities that students are able to pursue there.

Monica plans to major in communications with a concentration in business, and will graduate from Kepler with a B.A. from an accredited U.S. university. After graduating, she hopes to start her own business. In her free time, she likes to read books on leadership.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a U.S. college degree.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce, 37, is a married mother of three from the Wedza District of Zimbabwe. She has been gardening since 2011. On her farmland, she grows tomatoes, cabbages, and potatoes. Joyce volunteers as a life skills educator and counselor at the local school. She also assists the elderly in her community with their chores.

Joyce will use the Kiva loan to buy pesticides, seeds and a fence for one of the gardens. Her wish is to be a commercial farmer in her area. She also wants to use her second loan to expand her farming business where she grows and sells tomatoes.

loans.use: to purchase more seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Ella es Daniela es una hermosa joven de 20 años de edad, una persona sincera, tierna y carismática que tiene deseos de progreso, de estudiar, de apoyar  y sacar adelante sus padres, por ello hoy se encuentra solicitando tu ayuda para iniciar un negocio de venta de wafles, para lo que necesita un monto de dinero con el que comprara algunos activos fijos que restan por comprar y son de suma importancia.
Por ello formalmente solicita un apoyo económico que invertirá en la compra de; un congelador, mesas, sillas, waflera y surtido de bebidas.
Daniela espera un apoyo que le permita tener una unidad productiva de dinero que sea el apoyo para el cumplimiento de sus sueños, tales como estudio, mejora de calidad de vida, status.
texts.en:
This is Daniela, a beautiful 20-year-old woman. She is sincere, tender and charismatic, and wants to progress and study, and support her parents while helping them to move forward. To do so, today Daniela is applying for your help to start a business selling waffles. She needs a lot of money to do this so that she can buy fixed assets that are important for the business.

Daniela is therefore applying for a loan that she will use to buy a freezer, chairs, tables, waffle maker and beverages.

Daniela hopes to receive support that will allow her to have a productive loan that will help to achieve her dreams of studying and improving her quality of life and status.

loans.use: to start her business; she needs to buy a freezer, chairs, tables, waffle maker and beverages.

loans.name: Jorladys Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ella es Jorladys, una timida joven de 24 años de edad que está próxima a empezar una etapa de su vida que espera que sea el cambio radical que necesita.
Ella proviene de una familia humilde y trabajadora, para alcanzar sus sueños y metas han sacrificado mucho, sus padres para enviarla al colegio sudaron hasta la última gota de sudor en cada día para generar los recursos  necesarios.
Hoy en Jorladys es toda  una mujer y tiene deseos de tener su propio negocio y aportar en su casa para que junto con sus padres mejoren su calidad de vida y aspiren a un mejor futuro.
Para iniciar el negocio necesita el apoyo de los prestatarios ya que con el monto solicitado comenzara con una venta de pescado, por ello el dinero que se encuentra diligenciando será invertido en la compra de; pescado y neveras portables, piensa generar empleo y abarcar varios terrenos del municipio de Sincelejo.
texts.en:
This is Jorladys, a shy young 24-year-old who is about to start a new stage of her life. She hopes that this will provide the radical change that she needs.

Jorladys comes from a humble and hard-working family. In order to achieve her dreams and goals, her family has had to sacrifice a lot. Jorladys' parents gave the sweat of their brow to earn the necessary income to send her to school.

Today Jorladys is a grown woman and wants to have her own business and support her household so that, together with her parents, she can improve their quality of life and aspire to a better future.

To start this business, Jorladys needs the support of lenders. With this loan, Jorladys will start selling fish. This loan will therefore be used to buy fish and portable fridges. Jordalys is thinking about creating a job for another person and opening up her business in various parts of Sincelejo municipality.

loans.use: to start a business selling fish; she will buy fish in large quantities and portable fridges.

loans.name: Glenis Maria

texts.es:
Glenis es un ama de casa, cabeza de familia de 34 años de edad, residente de la zona de tierra alta, la cual generaba recursos realizando encargos, oficios varios y otros trabajitos temporales, con lo que ganaba más la ayuda de sus padres generaba el sustento para su hija, una princesa de 8 años de edad.
Glenis cansada de los trabajos temporales, de sentirse mal por no poder ser lo suficiente para mantener a su hijo, busco apoyo y acudió a Interactuar con una idea de negocio, la cual decidieron apoyarla, y hoy solicita tu apoyo para que ella pueda tener su propio local.
La idea de Glenis es montar una tienda de abarrotes, negocio que no necesita de mucha preparación y que puede adquirir experiencia y habilidad en la marcha.
Formalmente está mujer, solicita un apoyo económico, que invertirá en la compra de estanterías, nevera y surtido de productos de la canasta familiar, con el claro objetivo de iniciar un negocio, con el cual espera generar los recursos suficientes para el mantenimiento de ella y su hija.
texts.en:
Glenis is a housewife and head of her family. She is 34 years old and lives in high-altitude area. She used to earn a living in various temporary jobs. Her earning, plus support from her parents, provided an income for her to support her daughter, a beautiful eight-year-old girl.

Glenis, tired of temporary jobs and of feeling bad for not having enough to support her daughter, sought support and came to Interactuar with an idea for a business. Interactuar has decided to support Glenis, and today is looking for your help so that Glenis can have her own business.

Glenis' idea is to open a grocery store, a business that does does not require much preparation and she can gain experience and learn skills as she goes along.

Glenis is applying for a loan that she will use to buy stands, a fridge and staple goods with the objective of starting her own business. By doing so, Glenis hopes to earn enough income to support herself and her daughter.

loans.use: to open a grocery store.

loans.name: Tissiri Group

texts.fr: BOUREIMA est  malien alphabétise âgé de 58 ans, c’est lui qui tient la corde de bœuf sur la photo ;Il vit avec sa femme et ses 7 enfants dont 2 filles. âgées de 5 à 17 ans, ses 2 filles sont scolarisés.Il achète les bœufs les élève et les revend, il fait ce travail depuis 16 ans, sa femme est ménagère. BOUREIMA  sollicite un prêt au RMCR pour acheter les bœufs et l’aliment bétail en plus pour pouvoir bien nourrir ses bœufs et les revend  pour couvrir les dépenses de ses enfants, les frais scolaires, soins de santé et les habillements ; il gagne mensuellement 15000f de bénéfice par tête. il s'approvisionne dans les marché locaux et les revend dans les mêmes marchés.
texts.en:
BOUREIMA is 58 years old. He is from Mali and is literate. He is holding the cow’s cord in the photo. He lives with his wife and their seven children, two of whom are girls. His daughters are 5 and 17 years old and both go to school.

He has been buying cows, raising them, and reselling them for 16 years. His wife is a housekeeper.

BOUREIMA is asking for a loan from RMCR to buy cows and extra cow feed so that he can feed his cows and resell them. This will help his cover his children’s expenses, schooling fees, healthcare costs, and clothing.

He earns 15,000F in profit per head of cattle. He buys his cows in the local markets and resells them in the same markets.

loans.use: buy cows that he will resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a modern dairy unit.

loans.name: Elvys Esther

texts.es:
Esther es una mujer soltera con 35 años de edad, tiene tres hijos menores de edad los cuales adora con todas sus fuerza.
A pesar de las adversidades por las que le ha tocado pasar como lo fue la separación de su esposo quien era el sostén del hogar, ella no se rinde, sus deseos y ganas de salir adelante son admirables.
Trabaja transportando productos en el municipio de San Pedro, labora todos los días durante 7 horas diarias.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo con el cual comprara un caballo o un coche que le facilite el transporte de estos productos.

Su meta es continuar trabajando para mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda pero principalmente para pagarle la educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Esther, aged 35, is single, and has 3 young children whom she adores with all her heart.

Despite many hardships, including separation from her husband who was the breadwinner for the family, she hasn't given up, and her determination to get ahead is admirable.

She transports goods in the town of San Pedro, working every day for 7 hours.

She is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy a horse or a car for transporting goods.

Her goal is to continue working in order to be able to improve her home and, most importantly, to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a horse or a car for transporting products.

loans.name: Adolfo Andres

texts.es:
Muchas veces el señor Adolfo trató de buscar apoyo económico para poner en marcha su proyecto de montar una carnicería, pero al acudir a entidades financieras encontraba un no, ya que no contaba con historial crediticio que lo respaldara.
Pero todo esto cambio, un golpe del destino lo llevo a Interactuar que se la quiere jugar por su progreso, ahora se le abre una posibilidad de tener su propia carnicera, algo que ilusiona y pone muy contento al señor Adolfo, que muy formalmente solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de una cava para almacenar carne y comprar un cerdo para iniciar formalmente su negocio.
Adolfo agradece a todas las personas que puedan apoyarlo y se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas para demostrar agradecimiento.
texts.en:
Adolfo tried many times to raise finances in order to start his own butcher's business, but was unsuccessful owing to his lack of a credit history.

This all changed, however, when fate intervened and led him to Interactuar, who want to play a role in his progress. Starting his own butcher's business is now a possibility, which makes Adolfo very happy. He is requesting a loan to pay for a cellar for storing meat and to buy a pig so that he can start his business.

Adolfo is grateful to all those who are supporting him, and pledges to meet all his repayments on time in order to show his gratitude.

loans.use: to finally set up his own butcher's business, by buying a cellar and meat to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo de mujeres emprendedoras está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación donde 
una de las integrantes es la Sra. Josefa, que mediante las capacitaciones y seguimientos está mejorando sus ingresos, y también con las capacitaciones de los negocios que ofrece la fundación paraguaya.
La Sra. Josefa se dedica a las ventas, y pide este préstamo para poder comprar frutas, verduras, carnes, panificados, arroz, yerba, entre otros lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. Ella es una persona muy emprendedora y luchadora que se sacrifica por ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Emprendedoras ['Women Entrepreneurs'] Group is in their first cycle of the Women's Committee Program, during which they all work together and help each other get ahead. They are taking the Poverty Elimination Survey, where one of the members, Ms. Josefa, is improving her income through Fundación Paraguaya ['Paraguay Foundation'] offered business training and monitoring.

Ms. Josefa makes a living in sales, and requests this loan in order to purchase fruits, vegetables, meats, baked goods, rice, herbs, etc. which will help her to realize her business plan and improve her income. She is a very entrepreneurial person and a fighter who sacrifices to be someone in life.

loans.use: to purchase fruits, vegetables, meats, baked goods, rice, herbs, etc.

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Ama est une femme mariée dynamique qui vit à Tokoin  avec ses trois enfants  et son mari. Ama est âgée de 52 ans et  s’active parfaitement  pour avoir une bonne situation financière. Ama  est une revendeuse de pagnes qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Ama  nécessite ce prêt pour commander des pagnes de qualités afin de répondre favorablement aux besoins de ses clients et avoir une autonomie financière remarquable  pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Ama is a dynamic married woman who lives in Tokoin with her three children and her husband. Ama is 52 years old and works perfectly to have a good financial situation.
Ama sells pagne (traditional fabric) and gets her supplies twice per month at the market. In order to achieve her objectives, Ama needs this loan so that she can order quality pagne to respond favourably to her clients' needs. This will also help her to attain remarkable financial autonomy so she can help her children in their schooling.

loans.use: to buy six pieces of pagne (traditional fabric).

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Ella es Maribel, es una mujer de 34 años de edad, que antes se desempeñaba como empleada, pero sus sueños de progreso, de un mejor futuro, de sostenibilidad económica la han llevado a renunciar a su trabajo y lanzarse al emprendimiento.

Maribel con la ayuda de Interactuar junto con su aliado Kiva y las personas de buen corazón que diario frecuentan este local, quiere montar un negocio de venta de alimentos, ella tiene ahorrado un capital pero le resta un poco más, por ello necesita un apoyo económico para poder terminar su tienda.

El monto solicitado será usado en mejoras locativas, compra de un carro de comidas, y surtido de alimentos para preparar comidas rápidas.
texts.en:
Maribel, aged 34, previously worked as private sector employee, but her desire to progress, to improve her future, and to provide economic stability made her decide to give up her job in order to start her own business.

Maribel, with the help of Interactuar, its partner Kiva, and the good-hearted people who provide support daily, wants to start her own food-selling business. She has saved some capital, but needs a little more economic support, and is requesting a loan to be able to finish setting up her business.

The loan will be used to improve transport, to pay for a food cart, and to buy supplies for making fast food.

loans.use: to start a business selling food, by buying a food cart and supplies for making fast food.

loans.name: Kantiemou Group

texts.fr: Dans la photo , celle qui a la corde du jeune bélier s’appelle Ami. Elle est une malienne rurale analphabète  âgée de 28 ans. Ami  vit avec  son mari, ses  3 enfants (2 garçons et une fille) âgés de 3 à 14 ans. Son mari fait le commerce des articles de boutique (sucre, huile, savon ….). Ça fait 6 ans que Ami pratique l’embouche ovine, elle s’approvisionne dans le marché local et fait ses ventes à domicile.  Ami a besoin d’un soutien financier  pour acheter  plus de moutons  afin d’augmenter ses revenus et  payer les fournitures  scolaires, des habits supplémentaires et assurer les soins de santé de ses enfants.
texts.en:
In the photo, the woman holding the young ram's rope is Ami. She is a rural, illiterate Malian aged 28 years. Ami lives with her husband and her three children (two boys and one girl) aged between 3 and 14 years. Her husband sells grocery items (sugar, oil, soap...).
For six years now, Ami has been fattening cattle, she gets her supplies at the local market and sells from home. Ami needs financial support to buy more sheep so that she can increase her income and pay for school supplies, additional clothes and ensure her children's healthcare.

loans.use: to buy sheep for resale.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Mariée, Adjo a en charge trois enfants. Adjo  est âgée de 57 ans et habite à Tokoin où elle prépare et vend de la pâte bandée faite à base du maïs. Adjo  achète le nécessaire servant à la préparation une fois par mois au marché et vend sa marchandise à la devanture de son domicile. Adjo  sollicite ce crédit pour commander des sacs de maïs et des condiments  afin de gagner plus de bénéfices en vue de soutenir les besoins de son foyer et d’améliorer ses conditions de vie quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Married, Adjo takes care of three children. She is 57 years old and lives in Tokoin where she prepares and sells "pâte bandée" (corn mash). Adjo buys the necessary items for the preparation once per month at the market and sells her goods in front of her house.
Adjo is requesting this loan so that she can order bags of corn and condiments in order to earn more revenue, to provide for her household's needs and improve her daily living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two bags of corn and four piles of condiments.

loans.name: Beder Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio es un hombre casado con 41 años de edad, tiene cinco hijos menores de edad, debido a una dura situación económica la cual vivió luego de quedarse sin empleo durante varios meses, se dedicó a la cría de ganado, fue por este medio que encontró la solución a sus problemas económicos.
Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas diarias.
Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos, agroquímicos y remodelación locativa.
Su meta es continuar trabajando, formalizar su negocio y en un futuro dejárselo a sus hijos.

Aporte a la vida de este hombre, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Antonio, aged 41, is married and has five small children. After a tough period during which he was unemployed for several months, he began working with livestock, and this provided him with a solution to his economic problems.

He works every day for eight hours.

He is requesting a loan to buy pigs, agrochemicals and to remodel his premises.

His goal is to continue working, consolidate his business and be able to pass it on to his children in the future.

Please make a difference to his life by making a loan.

loans.use: to buy pigs, agrochemicals, and remodel his premises.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia es una señor con 46 años de edad, que debido a una dura situación económica la cual vivió luego de que su esposo, quien era el sostén del hogar, la dejara, ella decidió montar su propio negocio, un taller de confecciones, de allí se generan muy buenos ingresos, los cuales son invertidos en el estudio de su hijo y las necesidades que su hogar amerita.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de hilos y telas de alta costura.
Trabaja con un propósito, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, ya que esta lleva mucho tiempo de construida, se ha ido deteriorando y su estado actual no es el mejor.

Aporta a la vida de esta empresaria con ganas de salir adelante, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en: 46-year-old Cecilia has struggled to get by since her husband, who supported the family, left her. As a result, she decided to set up her own dressmaking business which has enabled her to earn a good income which she uses to invest in her son's education and pay for her family's needs. She is now applying for a loan to buy thread and fashionable fabric. She works with just one goal: to improve her home, which was built some time ago, has deteriorated over time and is now not in very good condition. You can make a contribution to this ambitious entrepreneur's life, please, make a loan.

loans.use: to buy thread and fashionable fabric.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre de 32 años de edad, que se encontraba desempleado, a cargo de un hijo y de su pareja, la falta de recursos, las necesidades, su hijo entre otros motivos lo llevaron a tomar una decisión que espera sea un cambio de vida y es que en el momento se encuentra solicitando un apoyo económico para iniciar su propio negocio, la venta de mercancía como ropa y calzado.

Este negocio lo quiere iniciar guiado por la necesidad económica y pro quizás es uno que no necesita mucha preparación, solo entusiasmo, perseverancia y un poco de suerte para vender.

Este será el inicio de su vida como independiente y Manuel espera que hagas parte de este préstamo aportando dinero que él usara en la compra de; ropa y calzado juvenil para hombre y mujer.
texts.en:
Manuel, aged 32, is unemployed and is responsible for his son and partner. His lack of financial resources and basic necessities, and a desire to provide for his son, led him to make a decision which he hopes will change his life. He is requesting a loan to start his own business selling clothing and shoes.

He wants to start this business because of economic necessity, but it is a business which doesn't require much training, just enthusiasm, perseverance and some luck.

This will be the beginning of a new life working for himself, and Manuel hopes that you will be part of this change by helping with a loan that he will use to buy clothing and footwear for men and women.

loans.use: to begin a business selling clothing and shoes in order to earn enough to feed his family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and grow her horticulture farming business.

loans.name: Jihad

texts.en:
This is Jihad, a hardworking 42 year old Palestinian refugee, and a married father of five children. In 1993, Jihad started an agriculture business, but increasing family expenses and needs led him in 1998 to work as a DJ in his region and nearby villages to make sure he can provide his beloved family with additional income.

Years went by, and Jihad was managing to run both businesses properly, until he realized that he has to start something else since his family is growing and their living needs are increasing.

In 2008, he became a bus driver and this is the third business he currently runs, in addition to agriculture and being a DJ.
