Jihad manages to support his family's needs, and he is willing to continue being the hard-working father who provides for his children with anything they might ask for, or need.

Jihad is very happy that he will soon see his son get married and, for this reason, he wants to take his parental part in this event. For this, he believes taking a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, is the best solution to pay for his son's wedding expenses.

Jihad is also working hard to buy a wider bus so that he can provide his transportation services to an increased number of passengers.

loans.use: to pay for his son's wedding expenses.

loans.name: Blanca Libia

texts.es:
Blanca es una luchadora, toda una guerrera, una veterana de mil batallas, a sus 68 años de edad siempre tuvo que protegerse y pelear por ganarse su sustento, ella es soltera y no tiene hijos, con su esfuerzo y sudor monto un negocio de cría de ganado bovino.

Su humilde propósito a su edad es mantener su actividad en pie, poder gozar de una vejez tranquila y su sueño es tener salud que le permita levantarse todos los días a realizar su profesión. 

Blanca quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de lechones y una vaca lechera para aumentar su producción y así contrarrestar la problemática del bajo precio de venta de leche.
texts.en: 68-year-old Blanca is a fighter, a real warrior and a veteran with countless battles behind her. She is single, childless, and has always had to look after herself and fight to earn her living. With great effort and sweat, she set up a business raising livestock. Her modest aim, at her age, is to keep her business going and enjoy a peaceful old age; her ambition is to remain healthy so she can get up each morning to work. Blanca wants to apply for a loan to buy piglets and a dairy cow to boost her production and thereby make up for the low sale price of milk.

loans.use: buy piglets and a dairy cow to boost her production

loans.name: Ingrid Tatiana

texts.es:
Tatiana es una mujer con 25 años de edad, madre de dos hijos menores, dedicada a la cría de ganado, un medio por el cual vio la solución a sus problemas económicos.

Sus deseos y sus ganas de salir adelante son admirables, pese a las circunstancias por las que ha pasado no se rinde, trabaja diariamente con el propósito de cumplir el sueño de pagar la educación de sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo con el cual comprara cerdos, alimento y mejoras locativas.

Ayuda a esta mujer a lograr su objetivo, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en: Tatiana is a 25-year-old mother of two young children. She raises cattle for a living as she saw this as a means of solving her financial problems. Her desire and ambitions to succeed are impressive and, in spite of the circumstances she has had to face, she never gives up, working every day with the aim of realising her ambition of paying for her children's education and improving her home. She is currently applying for a loan to buy pigs and food and to have some building work done. You can help this lady to achieve her ambition - make a loan, please.

loans.use: to buy pigs, food and have building repairs done.

loans.name: Sinikiwe

texts.en:
Sinikiwe is a 29-year-old woman, living in the Wedza district. She is married and a mother of one. She is an entrepreneur. Sinikiwe is currently running a beverage store, selling refreshments in her local town. She started the business when she was 21 years old, after realizing that she needed to be economically empowered to succeed in her community. 

She inspires other young women in her community. She hopes to grow her business and increase its profitability to better provide for her family’s needs and to provide for the needs of the vulnerable children in the community. 

When she received her first Kiva loan, Sinikiwe purchased more soft drinks to improve her sales and profits. She used the profits from her loan to venture into another business of floor polish production. She has managed to pay the school fees for her siblings and to purchase building materials for her house.

She is grateful for her past loan and now hopes to receive another larger loan for her to further expand her floor polish business so she can sell the floor polish in bulk.

loans.use: to purchase more floor polish for resale.

loans.name: Yajaira

texts.es:
Yajaira es una empresaria que se ha destacado por ser una persona, honesta y que oferta animales de calidad, siempre se ha caracterizado por la cría de aves, dicha profesión le ha permitido elevar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Yajaira se pone nostálgica al pensar como ha pasado el tiempo, su hija ya tiene 17 años de edad, tiene deseos de poder entrar a una universidad pero comprende que su familia es humilde y los costos son difíciles de mantener. 
Yajaira se mortifica por esta situación por ello pide la colaboración para iniciar la cría de cerdos, negocio que tendrá paralelo a su cría de aves.
Con este apoyo lo que pretende es tener una unidad productiva sostenible en el tiempo y así cumplir el deseo de su muchacha de pagar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en: Yajaira is an outstanding entrepreneur and an honest person who offers good quality animals. She has always bred birds and, thanks to this job, she has been able to improve her family's quality of life. Yajaira feels nostalgic when she thinks how time has gone by. Her daughter is now 17 and would like to go to university but he understands that his family is not well-off and it is difficult to cover the costs. Yajaira is very sad about this and so she is seeking support to help her set up a pig-rearing business alongside her poultry business. With this support, she intends to have a production unit which is sustainable over time and enable her daughter to achieve her ambition of going to university.

loans.use: to start up a new pig-rearing business alongside her poultry business

loans.name: Pramila

texts.en:
Pramila, 41, is a woman of courage and strength. She lives at Kandi with her family. Her family comprises her husband and one grown son.

In her young age, Pramila was deprived of any formal education (She can sign her name only.) due to financial issues in her family. But today, she stands as a testimony that there is no lack of opportunities for those who are willing to work hard. She works hard to manage her household. Now she wants to establish herself as a dairy farmer and to start her own milk selling business.

Pramila's husband, Balai, is a farmer, and their only son is a driver by profession. The nature of work for the both is very irregular. Jointly, they earn an average income, which hardly covers the household expenses of the family in this era of rising prices. By running her own business, Pramila wants to support her family and save for a secure future.

So Pramila seeks to take a loan from BJS to buy a dairy cow. She will sell milk to her neighbors. They will be her main clients. She also wants to sell dried cow dung, which is widely used as fuel for cooking, for additional income. With the business, she is expecting an increase in her family's income. To Pramila, a cow is not just an animal. To her, a cow is a source of employment, income, pride, economic development and welfare for the community.

She thanks her lenders, BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow and start a dairy business.

loans.name: Anowara

texts.en:
Anowara is a rural housewife, hailing from Bara Shoulmari in Falakata, West Bengal. She is 32 years old and blessed with three children (two daughters and one son). Her two daughters are studying in school and her son is below school-going age.

Anowara studied up to grade 4, but she is willing to provide her daughters a good education. Anowara's husband has been engaged in business to earn their livelihood.

Anowara's elder daughter, 11-year-old Rumpi, reads in grade 6 in Falakata Subhash Girls’ High School. She is confident and intelligent and would like to score well in her examinations. She tries to prepare properly for pursuing further education and so she needs private tuition. But her parents can't afford her educational expenses because of their inadequate income. But Anowara does not want her daughter’s education to stop due to her family’s financial hindrance. So she is seeking a loan from Kiva's partner BJS to bear the education costs of her elder daughter.

This loan will help towards paying her daughter’s school fees and buying necessary study materials and school uniforms, and it will ensure Rumpi access to good coaching, which will build a strong academic career and ensure her a bright future.

Anowara and Rumpi (as per photo) are very much grateful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay the school fees and buy necessary materials for her daughter's education in grade 6.

loans.name: Mario Andres

texts.es:
Andrés es un hombre casado con 25 años de edad, soñador, trabajador y muy humilde. Desde hace poco con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro montar su propio negocio, un salón de belleza, en un pequeño local arrendado por un familiar.
De allí genera muy buenos ingresos, los cuales son invertidos en sus estudios y en su familia.
Trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas diarias.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de los materiales de construcción necesarios para mejorar su local, ya que este no está en buen estado.

Trabaja con un propósito, el de cumplir el sueño de pagar la educación de sus hijos y en un futuro dejarles el negocio.
texts.en:
Andrés is a married man, age 25, a visionary, hard-working and very humble. A little while ago, with a lot of effort and dedication, he managed to open his own business, a beauty salon, in a small space rented by a family member.

From this, he generates very good income, which is invested in his education and in his family.

He works every day for 10 hours daily.

He is asking for a loan which he will invest in the purchase of construction materials needed to improve his retail space, since it is not in good shape.

He works with one purpose, to achieve his dream of paying for his children's education and, in the future, give them the business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials needed to improve his retail space, since it is not in good shape.

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es:
Miguel es un joven de 24 años de edad, próximo a cumplir un gran sueño en su vida, el cual es volverse independiente, durante su adolescencia ha ahorrado para montar un café-bar, ha puesto tanto empeño en este proyecto que ya cuenta con un local comercial, solo necesita un aliento económico para completar el dinero suficiente para poner en marcha su local.
Miguel quiere solicitar un préstamo, que invertirá en la compra de surtido de (helados, refrescos), sillas, ventiladores, refrigerador, adecuaciones locativas.
Todos estos esfuerzos los hace pensando en su pequeña de 4 años de edad, quiere darle un gran futuro y que se sienta orgullosa del papá que tiene.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 24-year-old youth, close to completing a big dream in his life, which is to become independent. During his adolescence, he had saved to set up a café-bar. He has put so much effort in this project that already he has a commercial location. He only needs an economic wind to get enough money to be able to launch his shop.

Miguel wants to request a loan, which will be invested in the purchase of an assortment of ice creams and sodas, chairs, fans, refrigerators, and renovations.

All these efforts have him thinking about his little 4-year-old. He wants to give her a great future, and he feels proud of his own father.

loans.use: to purchase of an assortment of ice creams and sodas, chairs, fans, refrigerators, and renovations.

loans.name: Faiber Alirio

texts.es:
Faiber es un joven soñador de 20 años de edad, que dedica sus días a trabajar buscando el progreso y apoyar a sus padres en el sostenimiento de su hogar.
Viene de una familia humilde, pero con gran vocación por el trabajo honesto, tiene una cría de ganado porcino y pollos, con esta empresa que le ayudaron a crear sus padres, espera cumplir sus sueños de estudio, mejorar calidad de vida y convertirse en el principal proveedor de pollos y cerdos de Sahagún. 
Con la clara intención de mejorar, ser competitivo, tener animales para trabajar en el futuro y prepararse para le temporada alta de venta, Faiber quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de pollos, alimento, cerdos y alevines para estimular la cría de peces.
texts.en:
Faiber is a young visionary, 20 years old, who spends his days working, seeking progress and supporting his parents in sustaining the household.

He comes from a humble family, but with great vocation for honest work. He has a business raising pigs and chickens, his parents helped him establish this business. He hopes to achieve his dreams of education, to improve his quality of life and become the primary provider of chickens and pigs in Sahagún.

With the clear intention of improvement, being competitive, having animals to work in the future and to prepare himself for the high season of sales, Faiber wants to ask for a loan to purchase chickens, feed, pigs, and young fish to boost his fish raising.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, feed, pigs and young fish to boost his fish raising.

loans.name: Ubaldo Enrique

texts.es:
Ubaldo es un hombre soltero de 37 años de edad, residente del sector de Sahagún, dedica todos los días a trabajar en su negocio de cría de ganado porcino, un negocio que aprendió de sus padres y que emplea por necesidad económico.

Es madre de un pequeño de 6 años de edad, tiene como sueño pagar la educación de su pequeño y con el tiempo tener cultivos en su terreno, pero todo tiene que hacerlo conforme sus recursos se lo permitan.

En base a este sueño quiere realizar todos los esfuerzos necesarios para alcanzarlo, por ello solicita un préstamo para potenciar su negocio principal, con el monto del préstamo comprara 6 cerdos + alimento, preparándose para la temporada alta de venta de cerdos.
texts.en:
Ubaldo is a single man, 37 years old, who lives in the sector of Sahagún. He spends every day working at his business raising pigs, a business that he learned from his parents and that he does from economic need.

He is the father of a 6-year-old little one, he has as a dream paying for the education of his little one, and with time to have crops on his land, but everything has to be done as resources permit.

Based on this dream, he wants to put all the effort needed into achieving it, so he asks for a loan to strengthen his primary business, with the amount of the loan he will purchase 6 pigs and feed, preparing himself for the high season of pig sales.

loans.use: to strengthen his primary business, with the amount of the loan he will purchase 6 pigs and feed.

loans.name: Anjali

texts.en:
Anjali is a 31-year-old married lady and a mother of three daughters. She lives in Ramthenga village in Falakata. She studied up to grade 10, but due to her family’s poor economy she had to drop out of school, so she is very much eager to give her daughters the best education they deserve. Anjali’s husband is a farmer, engaged with farming activities. Two of her daughters are studying and one is below school-going age.

Anjali's elder daughter Manisha is 15 years old and studying in grade 10 in Ramthenga High School. She will appear for her grade 10 board examination next year thus she needs proper guidance and reference books to score good marks in her final examination. But the income of the family is mostly spent on household expenses and cannot cover the whole education cost for their eldest daughter. Anjali cannot even provide necessary books for her daughter. Thus, providing private lessons to Manisha is too difficult for her to bear.

So to solve this problem Anjali applied for an educational loan from BJS (Kiva's partner). The loan amount will be utilized for purchasing her daughter's necessary books, paying the course fees, and for enrolling her in a private tutorial class. Anjali is hopeful that the loan will help her daughter to score good marks in her board examination.

Anjali and Manisha (seen in the photo) express their gratitude towards their generous lenders.

loans.use: to cover all the education-related costs of her daughter.

loans.name: Lakshi

texts.en:
Lakshi, 31, lives in a small village named Raychenga in Falakata. She studied up to grade 8. At an early age she got married. Now she is a careful mother of a daughter and a son. But she has a great determination to provide her children a decent lifestyle with good education. Thus she works hard to provide every support to her children.

Her daughter reads in grade 12 and her son is in grade 10. Both of her children will appear for board examination next year. Lakshi’s husband runs a small fast food stall. His income is marginal and it is the only source of income of the family.

Lakshi’s daughter, Sabita, is 16 years old and reads in grade 12 in Raichenga Vidyaniketan. She has chosen the arts stream. She is serious about her studies and tries to score good marks in her examination. But Lakshi faces difficulties to bear the education expenses of her daughter after meeting the household costs and educational expenses of her son with the sole income of her husband. Still, she is striving hard to provide uninterrupted education to her daughter.

Now Sabita needs some books and the guidance of good private tutors. Thus, Lakshi is requesting a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to bear the educational expenses of her daughter. She plans to pay educational fees and tuition fees and to buy books. This loan will help this bright young girl continue her education without any obstacles.

Lakshi and Sabita (in the photo) are grateful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's educational expenses.

loans.name: Sandra Liliana

texts.es:
Sandra es una empresaria de 36 años de edad que reside en el pueblo de Urrao, una confeccionista independiente que trata de sacar adelante su línea propia. 
Empezó su negocio con el sueño de posicionar sus prendas como las más usadas en Urrao, luego sueña con extenderse a Medellín y comenzar abarcar poco a poco todo Antioquía.
Sandra es madre de dos hijas de 6 y 15 años de edad, vive en una casa arrendada y junto con su marido se apoyan para el sostenimiento de su familia, el pensado es tener hogar propio y generar oportunidades a sus dos amadas princesas, tales como estudio y oportunidades universitarias.
Para fortalecer su profesión y poder confeccionar una tela más gruesa y de mejor calidad, Sandra quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de una máquina plana de confección, dicha máquina le permitirá coser tela jean, con lo que innovara y creara nuevas piezas para impresionar sus clientes.
texts.en: 36-year-old Sandra is an entrepreneur who lives in the town of Urrao. She is a self-employed dressmaker who is trying to forge ahead with her own range. She set up her business with the ambition of making her goods the most widely won clothes in Urrao and now she aims to extend her business to Medellin and to start to cover the whole of Antioquia department. Sandra, who has two daughters (aged 6 and 15), lives in a rented house. She and her husband both contribute to supporting the family. They would like to have their own home and to be able to provide opportunities for their two beloved princesses, such as giving them an education and the chance to go to university. To build up her business and be able to sew thicker and better quality fabric, Sandra would like to apply for a loan to buy a flatbed sewing machine. This would enable her to sew denim and thereby create new and innovative garments to impress her customers.

loans.use: to buy a flatbed sewing machine for handling thicker fabrics

loans.name: Wiligton De Jesus

texts.es:
Wiligton es un hombre soltero con 22 años de edad, junto a sus padres se dedica a realizar labores de campo, como lo son los cultivos de café.
Trabajan juntos como familia con un propósito en común, el de cumplir el sueño de tener unas vivienda propia.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de abonos, fertilizantes, insecticidas, riegos y otros.

Con su aporte este hombre invertirá en in futuro para su familia, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Wiligton is a single 22 year old man. With his parents, he works in the field with coffee plants. They work together as a family with a common goal, accomplishing the dream of having their own homes.

He is asking for a loan which he will invest into buying manure, fertilizers, insecticides, irrigation and others. With your support, this man will invest in a future for his family. Go for it, make a loan!

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, insecticides, irrigation and others.

loans.name: Aparna

texts.en:
Aparna, a 30-year-old rural housewife, is from the remote village of Falakata. She is married to a farmer. They are blessed with two daughters who are students of grade 8 and grade 6. Aparna’s husband is the only earning member for the family of four. His income is not sufficient to run the family well.

Aparna's 13-year-old daughter, Priyanka, is in grade 8 in Raichenga Vidyaniketan (high school). She is a studious girl and is very attentive to her studies. Every year, Aparna worries about the problem she faces in making ends meet at the beginning of the school session for the additional expenditures that are needed to cover school fees, uniforms and books for her daughter. But she knows that if she supports her daughter with all her educational requirements, she will score well.

This is why Aparna has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner’s BJS to pay for her daughter's tuition fees, and school expenses and to purchase necessary articles like books, pens, pencils, geometry box, uniform etc. She dreams to see her daughter with a good and bright academic career.

In this picture, Aparna and her daughter Priyanka are grateful to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase educational materials and pay schooling fees for her daughter.

loans.name: Alberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Alberto es un agricultor de 34 años de edad, una persona humilde, trabajadora y honrada que con sus cultivos ha sacado su familia adelante y ha llevado el pan diario a su mesa.

El sueño de Alberto es pagar la educación de sus hijos, seguir generando calidad de vida en su hogar y expandir sus cultivos. 

Alberto solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de insumos agrícolas; abonos, riegos y venenos para proteger su cultivo.

Este préstamo le permitirá realizar un debido mantenimiento a sus cultivos con la intensión de esperar una abundante cosecha.
texts.en:
Alberto is a 34-year-old farmer, a humble, hard-working and honest person who, with his crops, has gotten his family ahead and has brought the daily bread to his table.

Alberto's dream is to pay for his children's education, to continue generating a quality of life in his home and to expand his crops.

Alberto asks for a loan to purchase agricultural supplies, manure, irrigation supplies, and pesticides to protect his crop.

This loan will allow him to do the needed maintenance on his crops with the intensity of hoping for an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, manure, irrigation supplies and pesticides to protect his crop.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a married man. He has 2 children. He describes himself to be ambitious.

Stephen operates a retail business where he sells farm digging tools. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in a rural area and his primary customers are locals.

He will use the 10,000 KES loan to buy more stock of farm digging tools for selling. His business goal is to be the leading producer of Jua Kali products within 5 years. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of farm digging tools for selling.

loans.name: Shirley Esther

texts.es:
Esther es una mujer soltera con 36 años de edad, madre de un menor con 13 años de edad, su mayor deseo es montar su propio negocio, una pequeña tienda la cual situara en la sala de la casa donde reside.

La adversidad que la ha perseguido no ha sido obstáculo para querer salir adelante y realizar su sueño de comprar vivienda propia.

Solicita un préstamo con el cual abastecerá su futura tienda con productos de la canasta familiar y aseo personal.

Las actividades que realiza esta señora para sobrevivir con los suyos son dignas de aplausos y es aconsejable prestarle el beneficio de apoyo que solicita.
texts.en:
Esther is a single woman, 36 years old, the mother of a minor, 13 years old. Her greatest desire is to establish her own business, a small store which she will have in a room of the house where she lives.

The struggles that have chased her have not been an obstacle to wanting to get ahead and realize her dream of purchasing her own house.

She asks for a loan with which she will stock her future store with pantry items and personal care products.

The work that this woman does to survive with her family is worthy of applause and it is advisable to lend her the benefit of the support she asks for.

loans.use: to purchase pantry items and personal care products.

loans.name: Shyab

texts.en:
Shyab engages in a food vending business. She sells snack food such as suman (made from glutinous rice cooked in coconut milk, and often steamed wrapped in buli or buri palm leaves), and puto (rice cake).

She is 27 years old with two young dependents. Aside from that, she also raises livestock like goats and carabaos (water buffalo).

Shyab is asking for a loan to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, and leavening agent. These ingredients will be used in producing snack food, and she will sell it in her local community. Thus, it will enable her to improve her income and provide the needs of her young children.

In the future, she dreams to expand her business to make it productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, and leavening agent.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To increase her stock of animal prints for sale.

loans.name: Miguel Enrique

texts.es:
Su deseo de salir adelante es admirable, pese a su avanzada edad, Miguel, a su 59 años de edad, no disminuye los esfuerzos para lograr su objetivo, lo que se propone lo consigue.
Su labor es la cría y venta de ganado, trabaja todos los días durante 7 horas diarias.

Su mayor sueño es dejar el negocio a sus hijos, remodelar su vivienda.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de agro-químicos, fertilizantes y otros.

Para esto cuenta con el apoyo y ayuda de Interactuar y los colaboradores del portal Kiva.
texts.en:
His dream of succeeding is admirable. Despite his older age, Miguel, at 59 years old, does not lessen his efforts to achieve his goal. Whatever he proposes, he reaches. His job is raising and selling livestock. He works every day for 7 hours a day.

His biggest dream is to leave the job to his children and to remodel his home. He is asking for a loan to buy agriculture chemicals, fertilizers, and others. For this, he needs the support and help of Interactuar and the collaborations of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy agriculture chemicals, fertilizers and others.

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es:
Él es Carlos un empresario responsable, honrado, trabajador, con gran sentido de protección hacia su familia.
Carlos tuvo que pasar por un momento difícil, perdió a su esposa, una situación que lo desmorono pero gracias al apoyo de sus 4 hijos logro levantarse de aquel traspié y sigue trabajando por el futuro y sostenimiento de sus seres amados.
Carlos cuenta con un cultivo de uno de los productos más apetecidos en todo el Mundo, el café, como se puede apreciar en la foto, todavía está en etapa de maduración y necesita de algunos insumos agrícolas para apoyar ese proceso. 
Solicita un apoyo económico para abonos, fertilizantes, insecticidas y el pago de jornales para que sus trabajadores apliquen los insumos.
texts.en:
This is Carlos, a responsible, honest and hard-working businessman with a great sense of protection for his family.

Carlos had to go through a difficult time, he lost his wife, a situation that caused him to fall apart, but thanks to the support of his 4 children, he managed to get back up from that fall and continue working for the future and the support of his loved ones.

Carlos has a crop of one of the most desired products in the whole world -- coffee -- as can be appreciated in the photo. It is still in the stage of maturation and needs some agricultural supplies to support this process.

He asks for a loan for manure, fertilizers, insecticides, and to pay day laborers so that the workers can apply the supplies.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizers, insecticides, and to pay labor costs to apply the products.

loans.name: Pablo Alberto

texts.es:
Pablo es un hombre de 25 años de edad, trabajador y pujante residente del municipio de Tuchin, una zona de mucho conflicto armado, pero con personas honestas que con trabajo independiente buscan cambiar su realidad.

Pablo por su parte tiene un negocio de venta de productos de la canasta familiar, establecimiento que sirve para el sostenimiento de su pareja e hijo.

Inicio el negocio por necesidad económica, aprendió del oficio gracias a un amigo, lo trabaja 7 días a la semana con una intensidad de 15 horas diarias. 

Su sueño es pagar la educación de sus muchachos, y pasar a un siguiente nivel con su tienda, ya no solo trabajar por sobrevivir, quiere trabajar por salir adelante, sobresalir y generar calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Pablo is a 25-year-old man, hard-working and strong, a resident of the municipality of Tuchin, a zone with a lot of armed conflict, but with honest people who, with independent work, seek to change their reality.

Pablo, for his part, has a business selling basic pantry items, an establishment that serves to support his partner and child.

He began his business from economic need, he learned the trade thanks to a friend, and he works at it 7 days a week with an intensity of 15 hours daily.

His dream is to pay for his kids' education, and to go to a next level with his store, so he doesn't work just to survive, he wants to work to get ahead, improve himself, and generate a quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to stock his business with the sale of basic pantry items.

loans.name: Krishna

texts.en:
Krishna is a 42-year-old woman from the small village of Kandi in the district of Murshidabad. She is married and has one daughter who is a student of grade 4 in the local school. Her husband is involved in a small business. He is 44 and has secondary level education where as Krishna is a graduate.

The earning from Krishna's husband's business is not sufficient to overcome the financial hurdles that they are facing now. He needs to invest more money in his business to get a better income, but the major challenge is insufficient funds. So Krishna has decided to start a new business of supplying milk for addition income.

Krishna has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner). She wants to use the loan to buy a dairy cow. She plans to sell milk from door to door to her neighbors, which will bring additional profit. Moreover, the cow dung can be sold as farm manure and fuel for cooking. She believes that this business will help to improve their living standards and also assist with her daughter's education.

In future, Krishna wants to purchase more cows to enhance her business.

She is very much thankful to the lenders (BJS and Kiva) for funding her loan to make her dreams come true.

loans.use: to purchase a milking cow and start a dairy business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy furniture for the cafe.

loans.name: Ana Aleida

texts.es:
Aleida es una mujer con 30 años de edad, la adversidad que la ha perseguido no ha sido obstáculo para querer salir adelante y realizar el sueño de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Desde hace poco Aleida monto su propio negocio, un taller de confecciones, trabaja todos los días durante 7 horas diarias.
 Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo con el cual comprara una maquina industrial e insumos como telas e hilos.

Su actitud positiva y los deseos de progresar permiten ver, en esta mujer, unas ganas inmensas de superarse y por supuesto una respuesta favorable a su petición.
texts.en:
Aleida is a 30 year old woman. Adversity has followed her but hasn't been an obstacle for her to want to succeed and realize her dream of improving her living conditions. A little while ago, Aleida set up her own business, a garment workshop. She works every day for 7 hours a day.

Now she is asking for a loan to buy an industrial machine, and supplies like fabric and thread. Her positive attitude and wishes to progress allow this woman to see a huge desire to improve herself, and to get a favorable response to her request.

loans.use: to buy an industrial machine, and supplies like fabric and thread.

loans.name: Yankadi Group

texts.fr: Djénéba est la femme qui garde le mouton dans la photo. Elle est âgée de 45 ans et vit avec son mari  et ses 4 enfants au Mali, Ses enfants sont  âgés de 4 à 10 ans (2 garçons et 2 filles) dont une fille scolarisée. Djeneba est une malienne analphabète, son mari est un cultivateur. Elle achète des moutons pour l’élevage et les revendre avec intérêt dans les marchés locaux. Après 6 ans d’expérience elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter des  mouton et l’élever  afin d’augmenter son revenu et de payer les frais médicaux des enfants. Le prêt va lui permettre de gagner 40.000fcfa à chaque vente.
texts.en:
Djénéba is the woman who has one hand resting on the back of the sheep in the photo. She is 45 years old and lives with her husband and her four children in Mali. Her children are from 4 to 10 years old (two sons and two daughters). One daughter is enrolled in school.

Djénéba is from Mali and is illiterate; her husband is a farmer. She buys sheep to raise and resell at a profit in the local markets. With six years of experience, she is asking for a loan to buy sheep to raise so as to increase her income and pay medical expenses for her children. The loan will permit her to earn 40,000 F CFA with each sale.

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell later on.

loans.name: Marie Noella

texts.en:
Marie is a first-year student at Kepler. She grew up with her mother on farm in rural Rwanda. After a rigorous application process based on grades, test scores, and personal interviews, she was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year. The first in her family to attend university, Marie chose Kepler because of its academic rigor and focus on practical skills. 

Marie plans to major in Communications with a Concentration in Business, and will graduate from Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. After graduating, she hopes to work in the media, possibly radio. While at Kepler, she hopes to improve her design and technology skills.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more clothes, shoes, bags and cosmetics for sale.

loans.name: Luis Octavio

texts.es:
Luis aún recuerda ese comienzo difícil en el año 2000, cuando muy tímido pero con un gran sueño de triunfar empezó su negocio de cría de ganado porcino, luego de pasar 15 largos años se sorprende de lo que tiene ahora, un negocio sostenible y con ventas estables, ha generado calidad de vida a su familia y espera seguir haciéndolo por muchos años más.

Luis no quiere detener su progreso, se caracteriza por vender cerdos de excelentes calidad, se siente muy motivado porque se acerca el mes de diciembre, mes de mayor movimiento en ventas y necesita tener sus lechones gordos y grandes para esa época, por tal razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de alimento de engorde para sus cerdos, todo el monto solicitado es de acorde con el número de lechones y el periodo que hay entre agosto y diciembre.
texts.en:
Luis still remembers his difficult beginning in the year 2000, when, very timid but with a great dream of triumphing, he began his business raising pigs. After 15 long years, he is surprised by what he has now, a sustainable business with stable sales. It has generated a quality of life for his family and he hopes to continue doing it form many more years.

Luis doesn't want to stop his progress. He is characterized as selling pigs of excellent quality, he feels very motivated because the month of December is approaching, the month of the greatest turnover in sales and he needs to have fat and large piglets for this season, so he asks for a loan to purchase feed for fattening his pigs. The amount requested is according to the number of piglets and the time that there is between August and December.

loans.use: to purchase feed for fattening his pigs; the amount requested is according to the number of piglets.

loans.name: Antonio Jose

texts.es:
Antonio es un agricultor de 45 años de edad, empezó como independiente en el año 1995, guiado por la necesidad económica y buscando mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia ya que trabajar como mayordomo en fincas no generaba los suficientes recursos para mantener su familia. 

Es padre de dos hijos de 12 y 17 años, espera poder tener los suficientes recursos para pagar su educación y no dejarlos pasar necesidades.

Los fuertes cambios climáticos han afectado bastantes sus cosechas, ha tenido pérdidas considerables y este al ser un negocio que genera utilidad por temporadas lo hace un tema delicado.
En base a esta problemática Antonio quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que busca darle mantenimiento a sus terrenos y prepararlos para resistir el clima.
Con el dinero solicitado comprara abonos, venenos y pagara la mano de obra para que apliquen los productos a su cultivo.
texts.en:
Antonio is a 45 year old farmer. He started as an independent in 1995, guided by economic need and looking to improve his family's living conditions, since working as a butler on the farms did not generate the sufficient resources to support his family.

He is the father of two children, 12 and 17 years old. He hopes to be able to have the sufficient resources to pay for their education and keep them from needing anything. The strong climate changes have really affected his crops. He has had considerable losses and, since it is a business that gets seasonal use, it is a delicate topic.

Based on this problem, Antonio wants to ask for financial support to buy agricultural supplies to give his lands maintenance and prepare them to resist the weather. With the money, he will buy fertilizers, pesticides and labor so that the products can be applied to his crops.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to give his lands maintenance and prepare them to resist the weather.

loans.name: Arledy Maria

texts.es:
Arledy es una empresaria independiente de 41 años de edad, una persona residente del municipio de Lorica, un lugar donde las personas sobresalen más por su trabajo independiente que por oportunidades de empleo.
Arledy trabaja atendiendo una tienda de abarrotes y vende alimento de pollos y cerdos, actividades que les dedica 1s horas diarias ya que con esto genera los recursos suficientes para pagar todas las obligaciones en su hogar.
La empresaria se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de alimento de cerdo y pollos para la venta, comprar arroz, azúcar, víveres, abarrotes para abastecer su negocio.
Su sueño es tener una gran tienda y dejarle una buena herencia a su hijo.
texts.en:
Arledy is a 41 year old independent businesswoman. She is a resident of the town of Lorica, a place where the people excel more for their independent work than for employment opportunities.

Arledy works attending a grocery store and she sells chicken and pig food. She spends hours every day working because she gets the sufficient resources she needs to pay all of her household obligations.

She is asking for a loan to buy pig and chicken food to sell; to buy rice, sugar, food, and groceries to supply her business. Her dream is to have a big store and leave her son a good inheritance.

loans.use: to buy pig and chicken food to sell; to buy rice, sugar, food, and groceries to supply her business.

loans.name: Abiyemeje B Group

texts.en:
Vestine is a group leader; aged 35 years.She is married with 4 children aged between 3 and 14 years. The group is called ABIYEMEJE means “The one committed” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their business for changing their better future.

Vestine sells foodstuffs and has been running a business for 7 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more cassava, bananas and sorghum for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees of her children and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more cassava, bananas and sorghum for sale.

loans.name: Siguitimogoson Group

texts.fr: Le jeune bélier est  tenu par Rokia dans la photo. Elle a 25 ans et  vit avec son mari et ses 3 enfants dont 2 garçons scolarisés au mali. Depuis 3 ans Rokia achète les jeunes béliers dans les marchés locaux, les nourrit et les revend avec intérêt. Son mari est un agriculteur. Rokia cherche du fonds crédit pour acheter des jeunes béliers et des moutons pour son  élevage afin de gagner de profit au moment de la vente. Ce qui lui permettra d’aider son mari pour les charges familiales notamment les soins médicaux et la nourriture suffisante de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The young ram is being held by Rokia in the photo. Rokia is 25 and lives in Mali with her husband and three children, two of whom are boys and are enrolled in school. Her husband is a farmer. For three years, Rokia has been buying young rams in the local markets, feeding them, and selling them later on at a profit.

Rokia is looking for a loan to buy young rams and sheep to raise so she can make a profit when she sells them. This will permit her to help her husband with the family expenditures, especially for medical care and sufficient food for her children.

loans.use: to buy some young rams to raise and then resell at a later date

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is a young woman aged 25, married with one child and living in the Mt Darwin District of Zimbabwe. She is a member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae organization, which is actively involved in empowering school graduates to reinvest into the community.

To support herself, Purity operates a small retail shop in her community where she sells a variety of grocery products such as soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt and mealie meal. The store is conveniently located and it is the only one in her village. The first Kiva loan enabled her to expand her business by increasing her stock and raising her sales. She hopes to create employment in her community and improve her family’s standard of living.

She has had success with innovative business ideas and wishes to secure a shop at the nearest shopping centre and improve her grocery business. She desires to get a second Kiva loan so that she can further expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase  a variety of clothes, shoes, soap, eggs, sugar, flour, milk, juice, salt and mealie meal  .

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria, 21, is a single mother of a 1-year old boy. She is unemployed and is dependent on her parents for support to raise her child. Despite having a baby at a young age and not having a job, Gloria has ambitions and has decided to create opportunities rather than wait for help. She has joined a self-help group in her neighborhood and together they have secured land from the local council where they are setting up a chicken farm.

She is requesting for a loan from Kiva to buy an egg incubator that will produce quality grade eggs to be sold and distributed in the area. "We are making a deal with the tuck shops in our area so that we can be supplying them with the eggs" says Gloria.
Asked about her plans for the future, she says; "In five years i want to see our farm supplying eggs and chicken meat all over the province

loans.use: to buy a chicken egg incubator

loans.name: Concepta

texts.en:
Concepta is a married woman with 4 children. She describes herself to be hardworking. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals and basins. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in an area with high demand of the products and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital to expand business.

She will use the Kes 95,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. Her business goal is to own a cereals processing firm within 5 years. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand business.

loans.use: buy more stock of cereals

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more blankets, groceries and other supplies for resale.

loans.name: Janaki

texts.en:
Mrs.Janaki, a resident of Badikhel, Lalitpur, lives with her husband and two children, aged 16 and 13. Mrs. Janaki, with her husband, is engaged in making furniture and other useful items out of bamboo. It is their own business started a long time back. They sell their products in local markets.

They want to buy more raw materials for preparation of furniture out of bamboo. As they have good experience in their business, their market is good and they stay in the same business, which is very popular among the people. It is their first loan from BPW patan.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like bamboo

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Ablavi est une femme mariée âgée de 29 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Ayant deux enfants à charge, Ablavi  s’efforce  pour gagner son revenu  en revendant   des produits d’alimentations générales et divers. Pour s’approvisionner, Ablavi se rend trois fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des bols de farines de manioc et du maïs, Ablavi nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement.  Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Ablavi  va pouvoir aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes de la famille et favoriser l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ablavi is a married woman of 29 who lives in Tokoin. She is responsible for two children and struggles to earn a living by reselling foodstuffs and other items. To add to her inventory, Ablavi goes to the market three times a month.

Needing to order some bowlfuls of manioc flour and maize, Ablavi requested this loan to cover her purchase. With the profit that she will earn, Ablavi is going to be able to help her husband with the daily expenditures of the family and see to the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy 30 bowlfuls of manioc flour and 30 bowlfuls of maize

loans.name: Juan Fernando

texts.es:
Juan Fernando es un joven de 26 años de edad que se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino, una persona que se cansó de trabajar por sobrevivir, por solo generar el sustento diario, quiere progresar, ser un empresario respetado y muy vendedor, tiene una pequeña de 4 años de edad por la cual luchar y superarse, por ello necesita un apoyo económico, para la compra de cerdos, un préstamo que será usado con la intención de aumentar su cantidad de inventario, la temporada alta de venta de cerdos.
El gran sueño de Juan Fernando es comprar una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Juan Fernando is a young man of 26 years old who makes a living from pig farming. Juan tired of working just to survive and generate a livelihood; he wants to progress and be a respected business owner and salesman. He has a little girl of four years old and he is fighting and improving himself for her. As such, he needs financial support to buy pigs: he will use the loan to increase the amount of his stock as it is peak season for selling pigs.

Juan Fernando's great dream is to buy his own home.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es: Zoila de 51 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto a su esposo y su hija de 21 años de edad a quien le brindaron estudios, ella es una mujer muy emprendedora que siempre se ha superado a pesar de las circunstancias. Zoila cuenta con una pequeña sala de belleza desde hace 4 años le hace cortes de cabello a damas, caballeros y niños y gracias a este negocio es como ella obtiene sus ingresos económicos al igual su esposo le aporta para los gastos del hogar. Zoila desea construir dos cuartos en su vivienda ya que cuenta con un espacio adicional por lo cual los necesita, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo de block, cemento, arena láminas y mano de obra ya que necesita ampliar más su vivienda y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija.
texts.en: Zoila is 51 years old and lives in her family home together with her husband and their daughter who is 21 years old and is in school. She is a very entrepreneurial woman who has always exceeded despite the circumstances. Zoila has a small beauty parler for 4 years where they give haircuts to men, women and children and thanks to the business she gets her income same as her husband brings for the household expenses. Zoila wants to construct two rooms in her home since it has an additional space for what they need. It is for this that she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in: block brick, cement, sand sheets and labor that she needs to further expand her home and give a better quality of life to her daughter.

loans.use: to invest in: block brick, cement, sand, shingle and labor as she needs to expand her home and provide a better quality of life for her daughter.

loans.name: Meka

texts.en: Meka is a married man with six children living in Hoima, Uganda. He owns a grinding machine and supplements his income by operating a retail shop, as well as farming mainly tobacco. He hopes to grow his business and also educate his children. He is seeking a loan to buy more stock to sell in his shop, such as sugar, salt and soap.

loans.use: to buy more stock for his shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feeds.

loans.name: Roxana Carolina

texts.es: Roxana tiene 28 años de edad, vive muy feliz y agradecida en su humilde vivienda familiar que es acogedora, Roxana se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza también realiza venta de ropa desde hace varios años por lo que gracias a su empeño y laboriosidad logra salir adelante es reconocida  como un mujer  honrada y trabajadora en su comunidad. Roxana desea comprar materia prima para cambio de techo y cambiar las láminas de la pared, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: compra de láminas galvanizadas, cemento, arena, puerta y mano de obra y así poder sentirse segura y protegida, ya que las que tiene actualmente se encuentran deterioradas como se observa en la fotografía.
texts.en: Roxana is 28 years old. She lives happily and and gratefully in her humble and cozy family home. Roxana sells beauty products. She has also sold clothing for several years. Thanks to her hard work and dedication, she has been able to get ahead. She is known as an honest and hardworking woman in her community. Roxana wants to buy raw materials to change the roof and the sheeting for the walls of her home. That is why she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, cement, sand, a door and labor so that she can feel safe and protected. Right now they are in poor condition, as can be seen in the photograph.

loans.use: to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, cement, sand, a door and labor costs, so she can feel secure and protected.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en: Teresa is from Concepcion, Iloilo. She is married and has three school aged children ages 19, eight and one year old. Teresa is 45 years old and dreams to have a better means of living in the future. She wants to improve their fishing business which is their source of income. Teresa and her husband have been doing this for more than 15 years. They work hard to provide the needs of their family. With that, she is asking a loan to buy fishing net, fishing weighs and fishing rod. She also plans to use the money she is requesting to repair their fishing boat like buying paint and wood used to repair.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, fishing weighs, fishing rod and for boat repair

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To increase her stock of telephone accessories for sale.

loans.name: Reanante

texts.en: To earn a living, Renante is operating a chainsaw. He is doing this for four years. He works hard to provide the needs of his four children. The oldest child is 13 years old while the youngest child is three years old. He is from San Dionisio, Iloilo. 47 years old Renante, dreams to improve their livelihood. He wants to give the best to his family. With that, he is asking a loan to give him capital to continue operating his business. He is asking a loan to buy timber and gasoline.

loans.use: to buy timber and gasoline

loans.name: Victorina

texts.en:
Victorina is a merchant living in the town of Loon, Bohol. She  is a married woman with eight children . Her youngest child is 19 and still attending school. She has been engaged in dried fish vending for more than 20 years now. Her husband has an income that could help defray the families daily needs. 

She has requested a loan to buy stocks of  dried fish and box ( for dried fish storage). It will cause to augment her income and display variety of dried fish to sell. For these, slowly she could pay her obligations and continue support the education of her child. 

Victorina   dreams to expand her business to make it productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy   stocks of dried fish and box ( for dried fish storage)

loans.name: Genara

texts.en: Genara  is a 31 year old woman from the community of Talibon, Bohol.  She is married with three children ages 2, 4 and 9.  Genara  is engaged in hog raising for three years now. This is her main livelihood to support the needs of her family. She is asking for a loan to buy feed and more piglets to raise. Feed is very important for a quality growth of her hogs. This contributed to a good sales for most hog raisers. She hopes that she can continue sending her children to school and make a success out of her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and more piglets

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 24 years is married and supports two children. She is a small scale farmer earning an income of KES 13,000 per month. 

She has applied for her first loan from Vision fund Kenya of KES25,000 to buy certified fertilizers, herbicides and pesticides to spray her crops for more harvest. 


Ruth plans to use the gained profits to repay her loan and the surplus to expand her farming activity and educate her children. she hopes to improve her family living standards .

loans.use: to buy certified fertilizers, herbicides and pesticides to spray her crops for more harvest

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 43 años de edad, ama de casa pro naturaleza, madre de 4 hijos adolescentes, la cual necesidad económica la conllevo a buscar alternativas para generar ingresos para complementar los que generaba su esposo para el mantenimiento del hogar.

Maria tiene un negocio de cría de ganado porcino que ha ido en ascenso, gracias en gran parte a su perseverancia, cuidado y buenas relaciones, a pesar de la competencia en el sector esta empresaria busca la forma de vender sus cerdos y llevar el alimento a la mesa de su casa.

La sostenibilidad y perdurabilidad de su negocio es su principal objetivo, y ya que está próxima la temporada de venta de cerdos quiero solicitar un préstamo para estar a la vanguardia y a la par con su competencia.

El préstamo será usado en la compra de cerdos, vacunas, alimento de engorde, cemento y láminas de zinc para la construcción de chiqueras.
texts.en:
María is a 43 year old woman, a environmentally conscious housewife, and a mother to four teenagers.  Economic necessity has driven her to seek alternatives to generate an income that complements what her husband generates to maintain the household.  

Maria has a pig breeding business that has been growing, thanks to her perseverance, care, and good relationships.  Despite the competition in the sector, this entrepreneur looks for ways to sell her pigs and put food on her table.  

The sustainability and durability of the business is her main objective, and as the time to sell the pigs is approaching, she wants to request a loan to be on the cutting edge and on par with her competition.  

The loan will be used to buy pics, vaccines, fattening foods, cement, and zinc sheets to build her pigpen.

loans.use: to buy pics, vaccines, fattening foods, cement, and zinc sheets to build her pigpen.

loans.name: Tazeem

texts.en:
Tazeem is 38; she is mother of one daughter and three sons and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. From the past many days his rickshaw is not working properly because of which he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However due to the lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing rickshaw.

Therefore, Tazeem has requested for a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Tazeem is so much thankful to Kiva and brac Pakistan.

loans.use: to cover the repairing cost of her husband's rickshaw

loans.name: Somaly's Group

texts.en:
A married woman named Somaly is in her 59 years of age and she is blessed with five children, living in Battambang province. The main source of this family comes from cassava, rice, and corn growing. Sometimes, she works for others for a fee to supplement income.

Somaly lacks of working capital, so she formed a group of five members to take out a loan from VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). This is the second time of her and the past helpful loan that was paid back successfully enabled her to renovate her house more comfortable to live. As a representative of a group, she will wisely spend her loan on buying cassava seeds and paying for the plowing fee. She hopes that this loan will help her improve the business so as to earn more income to support her family.

loans.use: To spend on buying cassava seeds and paying for the plowing fee.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is 28 years, is married and supports four children. She is a small scale farmer. She has applied for her first loan from Vision fund Kenya of KES.25,000 to buy an additional dairy cow for more milk production production to raise income to meet family demands. 

She plans to use the gained profits to buy more animal feeds for his dairy cows for more milk production as well as educating her children. she hopes to improve her family living standards and health care.

loans.use: to buy an additional dairy cow for more milk production to raise income, so as to meet family demands.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Néstor es un hombre soltero de 51 años de edad, no tiene hijos, ni un trabajo fijo, se vale de su negocio de venta de mercancía el cual se está decayendo por la falta de capital para comprar inventario, algo que lo tiene muy afectado pues su principal fuente de ingresos son las ventas que realiza en las veredas y al no tener surtido nuevo para mostrar merman sus ventas.
En base a esta problemática Néstor quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de ropa casual para hombre, su propósito es recobrar la credibilidad y los clientes que tiene en las veredas ya que son su principal fuente de ventas.
texts.en:
Néstor is a 51 year old single man. He has no children and he doesn't have a stable job. He makes his living by his business selling merchandise. It has been going down due to a lack of capital to buy inventory. This has really affected him because his main source of income is the sales, which he does on the sidewalks. With no new inventory to show, his sales go down.

Due to this problem, Néstor wants to ask for a loan to buy inventory of casual men's clothing. His objective is to recover credibility and the customers that he has on the sidewalks, because it is his main source of income.

loans.use: to buy inventory of men's clothing to sell on the sidewalks and reclaim his former customers.

loans.name: Kannanur Jlg - 026 Group

texts.en:
Kokila earns her daily wage by labouring in the agricultural fields. She is married and a mother of two children. She lives with her family in a village in Tiruchirappalli district of Tamil Nadu. The income from her current work is proving insufficient to meet her household expenses. The work is also seasonal in nature. She is worried that if she does not add a more steady source of income, she will not be able to save enough for her children’s education.

Thus she underwent training in doing semi-precious stone work on sarees under Gramalaya Microfin Foundation. She now wants to start her business butt lacks the funds to do so. Thus, she seeks a loan. Kokila formed a group with women who come from similar backgrounds and are being held back due to the shortage of funds. The loan will be used to start their respective businesses. Your loan will help these women boost their income and save for future needs.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to start her saree embroidered semi-precious stone work business.

loans.name: Marie Claire

texts.en:
Marie Claire is a first-year student at Kepler. She grew up in a rural province in northern Rwanda, and due to her impressive academic record, she was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year. She chose Kepler because of its innovative educational system.

Marie Claire plans to major in Health Care Management, and will graduate Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. She believes that her greatest areas of growth at Kepler will be time management and learning to effectively collaborate in groups.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Adelaida ,

texts.en:
At the age of 62, Adelaida is still working to earn a living. She buys and sells dried fish and has been doing this for two years. Aside from buying and selling business, she is also engaged in farming. This business will become the source of income that she raised her eight children. Her children were already grown up and have their own family. With that, Adelaida is working hard to save money for the future. Thus, when she gets old she has her own savings.

Adelaida is asking a loan to buy dried fish to sell and fertilizer for her crops. In the future, she wants to improve her business to have enough for her consumption.

loans.use: to buy dried fish and fertilizer.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 58 years old. She is married and has two children. Her business is dairy farming. She has been in this business for 25 years. 

She earns a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings. This is her second loan with VisionFund Kenya. She will use the loan to buy animal feeds. 

She will use the profits from expanded business to service the loan and increase her savings to borrow a bigger next loan. Her hopes and dreams are to be a big supplier of fresh milk and improve the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds.

loans.name: Lelia

texts.en:
Lelia is 59 years old with two children. Lelia works very hard to provide for them.

Lelia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 5000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items like eggs, canned goods, condiments, home care products, and other groceries and other products to sell.

Lelia has been in this business for 3 years. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

In the future, Lelia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like eggs, canned goods, condiments, home care products, and other groceries and other products to sell.

loans.name: Universal 1Group

texts.en:
Universal 1 group is made up of 5 women who are married mothers with two children to care for. They are from Accra, located in the greater-Accra part of the country. It is a place known for its typical finishing and trading. Some of the items that they sell are sauce pans, mosquito coil, grocery, foodstuff, fresh fish and materials.

These mothers are hard working and responsible, with a drive to improve themselves. Each has a different economic pursuit, but they support each other in moving their businesses forward, and accomplishing goals and objectives such as providing schooling to their children and growing their businesses.

Due to her desire to succeed, the group representative is Regina who sells metal sauce pans from door-to-door. She has run this business for five years. She works eight hours a day selling her products. The purpose of the loan is to invest in work capital and to stock her business for the purchase and sale of metal cooking utensils and sauce pans, so that in the not too distant future she can increase her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase and sell metal cooking utensils and sauce pans, so that in the not too distant future she can increase her earnings.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Ella es Luz Marina, una tranquila y relajada mujer de 59 años de edad, ella disfruta su vida, valora lo que tiene y trabaja diario por mantener y no pasar necesidades.
Vive con su pareja y tiene dos hijos, ambos mayores de edad, se dedica a tender su tiende de abarrotes, negocio que inicio por necesidad económica y por gusto al trabajo independiente, nunca se vio como empleada y hoy se siente orgullosa de ser su propia jefe y manejar sus tiempos.
Luz Marina solo espera tener salud para trabajar en lo que le gusta por un largo periodo de vida, una vez que no sienta en capacidad de atender su negocio se lo dejara a sus hijos, mientras eso ocurre se preocupara por mantener la tienda en el tiempo.
Luz Marina quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio, con productos como arroz, fríjol, lentejas, papa, yuca, tomate, entre otros.
texts.en: Luz Marina is a laid-back, low-key fifty-nine-year-old woman. She enjoys her life, appreciates what she has, and works every day to support herself and afford all the necessities. She lives with her partner and she has two children, both adults. She has a general store, a business she started up out of financial need, and out of choice she works independently. She has never seen herself as an employee, and now she is proud to be her own boss and manage her own schedule. Luz Marina only hopes to be healthy enough to continue to do the work she enjoys for a long time. Once she no longer feels able to manage her business she will leave it to her children, and try to keep it going. Luz Marina would like to solicit a loan to stock her business, with products such as rice, beans, lentils, potatoes, yuca, tomatoes and more.

loans.use: to stock her business, with products such as rice, beans, lentils, potatoes, yuca, tomatoes and more.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 35-year-old woman who is married with three children and is currently living in the Mount Darwin District of Zimbabwe. As a volunteer Camfed Learner Guide, she teaches life and study skills to students in a community school.

Over the last year, Caroline has grown her piggery business to its current capacity – producing about seven pigs every six weeks and selling them to local residents and butcheries. Caroline would like to increase her sales volume and become a supplier to major supermarkets. She used the Kiva loan to enlarge the pig house so that she will be able to increase production.Caroline’s business is doing well.

She also bought a cow with the other part of the loan to start a family project. She also diversified to buying and selling clothes which has seen her manage to repay her loan without any challenges. She is managing to send her 2 kids to school and also looking after her old grandmother, she is also paying fees for an orphan left to her by her sister. She now keeps record of her business. She hopes to get a second Kiva loan so that she purchase more clothing stock.

loans.use: to purchase pig feed and also a variety of clothes and shoes

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en:
Jean Claude is a first-year student at Kepler. He grew up on a farm in eastern Rwanda with his six siblings. Due to his strong academic record, he was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year, and chose Kepler because it provides a focused business curriculum.

Jean Claude plans to major in Communications with a Concentration in Business, and will graduate from Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. After graduating, he hopes to work in the private sector, possibly in banking. His goal is to be in a position to support his family.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El señor tiene 65 años de edad y es pensionado, sufre de cataratas en ambos ojos por lo que su calidad de vida es muy limitada ya que depende que algún familiar lo apoye en sus actividades diarias. Necesita con urgencia un implante de lente intraocular en su ojo izquierdo que es el mas dañado, todo esto para poder valerse por si mismo. Sus recursos son escasos ya que la pensión que recibe no le alcanza para solventar la operación.
texts.en:
He is 65 years old and retired. He suffers from cataracts in both eyes. Therefore, his quality of life is very limited because he depends upon a family member to help with his daily activities.

He urgently needs an intraocular lens implant on his left eye, which is the most damaged. All of this is so that he is able to take care of himself. He has scarce resources because the pension that he receives is not enough to pay for the operation.

loans.use: to pay for ophthalmic treatment.

loans.name: Mombasa Group

texts.en:
Wema who is in her early 40s, is single with one child, who is still in school. She has been selling cosmetics for five years now. She works from 08am to 08pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Wema’s 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep on increasing the cosmetics stock and has managed to pay back all her loans successfully. She used the profit for loan repayments, bough TV set, a plot of land, a radio, cupboards, and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to expanding her business and to buy up date cosmetics to meet her customers' requirement. She dreams of building a house for renting in order to get more revenue for supporting her family.

Wema will share this loan with her loan group Mombasa which consists of three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy expanding her business and to buy up date cosmetics to meet her customers' requirement

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 50 years old. He is married with two children. His business is carving and selling curios. He has been in this business for 20 years.

He earns a monthly income of twelve thousand shillings. This is his second loan with VisionFund Kenya. He plans to use the loan to pay school fees and buy wood for carving curios.

He plans to use the profits to increase savings to enable him take a bigger loan. His hopes and dreams for the future are to have a big established business.

loans.use: to pay school fees and buy wood for carving curios.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a fish vendor for more than 20 years now. She sells fresh fish to the local in her place.
She is married woman with four grown children from Loon, Bohol. Her husband is also a fisherman. She needs additional capital to support her fish vending business.

She is asking for a loan to buy foam (fish storage) and additional stocks of fish. These will boost her livelihood and sold variety of fish. It will also improve her husband's catch and able her to settle her obligations.

With the additional capital, she is determined to expand her business for sustainable living in the future to come.

loans.use: to buy foam (fish storage) , additional stocks of fish and fishing net

loans.name: Aramayis

texts.en:
Aramayis is 63 years old and he lives in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. He is married and he lives with his wife and son who works as a cook. His also has two daughters, who are already married and they live with their families. Aramayis has for many years worked at the city’s water and sewerage company as an operator.

Aramayis would like to cooperate with Kiva as his wife has some health problem and she needs to have a course of treatment. He will be very thankful if Kiva lenders support him with this loan amount and he will be able to pay for his wife’s treatment.

loans.use: to pay for his wife’s treatment course

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 32-year-old woman with one child living in Masindi, Uganda. She has a mobile money business which she started with the aim of catering for her family needs. With the increased demand for mobile money services, she hopes to expand her business to earn greater returns.

She is very hard working, and requests for a loan to add more float to her mobile money business for better service delivery.

loans.use: to add more float to her mobile money business.

loans.name: Nidia Aidee

texts.es:
Aidé es una mujer casada con 49 años de edad, desde hace poco logro montar su propio negocio, un taller de confecciones, de allí obtiene los ingresos suficientes para lograr cubrir las necesidades que su hogar amerita.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de hilos y telas de alta costura.

Aidé quiere seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño de pagar la educación de sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Ayuda a esta mujer a lograr cumplir su objetivo, anímese, preste hoy.
texts.en:
Aidé  is a married 49 year old married woman who recently decided to begin her own business, a garment workshop, from which she will earn sufficient income to cover the household costs. 

She is requesting a loan to invest in threads and high quality fabrics.  

Aidé wants to continue working to fulfill her dream of paying for her children's education and improving the conditions of their house. 

Help this woman to meet her goal, take heart, and loan today!

loans.use: to buy threads and fabrics for quality sewing.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more blankets, tracksuits, shoes, dresses and other items for resale.

loans.name: Matilda

texts.en:
Matilda is a 21-year-old young woman from the Mt. Darwin District of Zimbabwe.She is a Camfed Learner Guide at the local secondary school, where she facilitates sessions on life skills. Matilda also helps with the general cleaning of the community hospital.

Matilda is operating a rented stall at the local market, where she sells shoes, dresses, skirts, t-shirts, and jackets. With her first loan proceeds, Matilda purchased shoes, dresses, skirts, t-shirts, and jackets in bulk to reduce transportation costs and meet the demand of her customers. Her greatest hope is to further expand her business into a large shop.

She diversified to buying and selling maize and also barters maize with cows which in turn she sells to the butcheries. The business has seen her become independent in terms of financial standing. Her aspirations are to have a bigger marketing space so that she can sell more clothes to sell to different types of customers. She also wants to start another stable business instead of basing with buying and selling clothes. If she passes her Ordinary levels she wants to become a professional in business and management.

loans.use: to purchase more shoes, dresses, skirts, t-shirts, and jackets.

loans.name: Ado

texts.en: Ado is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Kaza Village. Ado  joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. In the past, Ado suffered from poor yields that crippled his ability to repair his house or move into a bigger home. Now that he has joined Babban Gona, Ado has the chance to attain yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the national average in Nigeria and earn an income of up to 2,000 USD per hectare. Through Babban Gona’s input loan, he will have access to high-quality farm inputs such as fertilizers, herbicides, and improved seeds that will increase his yields and income considerably. With ambitious goals of harvesting 20 bags of maize this year, Ado can now ensure that his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: ho purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his yields

loans.name: Yakubu

texts.en:
Yakubu is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Gangarida village. Yakubu joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children.

Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Yakubu will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilizer, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags.

This will see him increase his household income considerably. Thanks to Babban Gona's support, Yakubu now has the opportunity to increase his yield and income and to use his additional earnings to build a better home for his family.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase the farmer’s yields.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is 43 years old, a married lady who has been running a small general store in her community for many years with her husband (also shown in the photo).

She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Shazia makes enough to provide for her family.

To make her store fully stocked, she availed Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers.

In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently.

Shazia wishes to utilize part of her revenues on providing a good quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers

loans.name: Nancy Del Carmen

texts.es:
Nancy es una madre cabeza de familia de 36 años de edad, una mujer muy trabajadora, admirable, tiene tres pequeños de 12, 3 y 2 años de edad, son su esperanza, su motor de vida, estos muchachos significan todo para ella, por eso pone todo su empeño en sus actividades agrícolas ya que de esto depende el futuro de sus niños.
Nancy se dedica al cultivo de plátano, es su producto estrella el cual distribuye en la plaza de mercado.
Ya que es mujer, ciertas actividades del campo le quedan muy pesadas de realizar y en ocasiones debe pagar jornales para que apoyen su gestión en el campo.
Nancy necesita insumos agrícolas para el mantenimiento de sus productos, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de abonos, y venenos para regar en todo su cultivo, parte del capital será destinado para pagar la asistencia técnica que necesita para aplicar estos productos, que es una de las actividades que aún no puede realizar, pero espera adquirir experiencia y fortaleza física para hacerlo ella misma.
texts.en:
